title: Hong Kong Cracks Down on Fake Crypto Exchange Allegedly Linked to Elon Musk
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: Hong Kong Cracks Down on Fake Crypto Exchange Allegedly Linked to Elon Musk

The Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) has warned the public regarding Quantum AI, an entity allegedly engaged in fraudulent activities related to virtual assets and impersonating Elon Musk. Quantum AI claims to leverage artificial intelligence technology to provide cryptocurrency trading services.
However, the Hong Kong SFC has raised suspicions that Quantum AI deceived the public by impersonating Elon Musk, the renowned entrepreneur and developer of Quantum AI‚Äôs purported technologies.
SFC Warning To All Investors About Quantum AI

According to the report, Quantum AI utilized deepfake videos and photos on its website and social media platforms to create the illusion that Elon Musk was associated with the platform. This deceptive tactic misled investors into believing Quantum AI had Elon Musk‚Äôs endorsement or involvement.

Hong Kong SFC issues an alert against Quantum AI. Source: sfc.hkFurthermore, on May 8, the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) raised suspicions against Quantum AI for allegedly disseminating ‚Äúfalse and misleading information‚Äù about the company through an undisclosed news website. This strategy was purportedly aimed at promoting its crypto trading services and gaining credibility among unsuspecting investors in Hong Kong.
According to SFC suspicion alert on its website, SFC wrote,
‚ÄúIt claims on the ‚Äúnews‚Äù website that the Hong Kong public has been using its technology to trade in cryptocurrencies and is able to earn ‚Äútoo-good-to-be-true‚Äù returns.‚Äù

In response to these allegations, the Hong Kong Police Force has intervened, taking action to block Quantum AI‚Äôs website and remove associated social media pages at the request of the SFC. Despite these enforcement measures, authorities remain vigilant, cautioning the public against potential ongoing fraudulent activities.

There is a concern that fraudsters may attempt to circumvent regulatory actions by creating new websites and social media pages with similar domain names, perpetuating the deception and posing risks to unsuspecting investors.
As such, investors are advised to exercise caution and perform thorough due diligence before engaging with any virtual asset-related services.
Hong Kong SFC Highetened Investor Security

The SFC recently warned about an alleged fraudulent crypto exchange named MEXC, cautioning the public against its activities. The fake MEXC reportedly enticed victims through social media and messaging groups, offering free investment advice and prompting them to buy crypto on its websites.

The SFC added the fake MEXC and its websites to its alert list, suspecting illegal virtual asset trading activities. Hong Kong police have restricted access to MEXC websites and are collaborating with the SFC to investigate further instances of fraudulent behavior. The SFC has also warned about suspicious websites impersonating licensed virtual asset trading platforms. Specifically, the commission identified two platforms‚ÄîHSKEX and OSL Digital Securities Limited‚Äîbeing impersonated by fraudulent websites, potentially deceiving investors into believing they are interacting with legitimate entities.

Hong Kong SFC also issued a public notice on March 4 regarding BitForex, a cryptocurrency exchange allegedly involved in fraudulent activities. The SFC‚Äôs notice highlights suspected virtual asset fraud involving BitForex, emphasizing that the exchange is neither licensed by the SFC nor has it applied for a license to operate a virtual asset trading platform in Hong Kong. Given the risks of dealing with unlicensed entities, investors are urged to exercise caution when engaging with unregistered Bitcoin platforms. In response to these concerns, the SFC has blocked access to BitForex‚Äôs web links and social media pages to reduce potential harm to investors.

The SFC also issued a cautionary statement on March 14, advising crypto traders against using the cryptocurrency exchange Bybit and identifying 11 of its products as suspicious investments. The SFC has flagged leveraged tokens, options, futures contracts, and similar crypto services offered by Bybit, highlighting the potential financial risks and losses for investors associated with these unauthorized products.

title: Digitex Founder Pleads Guilty to Failure in Anti-Money Laundering Program Implementation
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: Digitex Founder Pleads Guilty to Failure in Anti-Money Laundering Program Implementation

In an announcement on Tuesday, the U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office for the Southern District of Florida said Todd pleaded guilty to ‚Äúwillfully causing‚Äù Digitex to violate the Bank Secrecy Act. Notably, authorities indicted the former CEO in February.
‚öñÔ∏è Digitex CEO Charged for Illegally Operating Crypto Futures

Digitex crypto futures exchange CEO Adam Colin Todd willfully failed to include an adequate anti-money-laundering (AML) program, a Florida federal court alleged.#CryptoNews #newshttps://t.co/6BZrFGpdTl
‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) February 14, 2024
Former Digitex CEO Adam Todd Pleads Guilty to Violating Bank Secrecy Act

According to the indictment, Todd played an active role in operating an unregulated futures trading platform servicing U.S. customers from 2018 to 2022, failing to implement and maintain AML and Know Your Customer (KYC) programs. Todd is also claimed to have publicly refused to implement KYC policies for Digitex Futures.

In 2020, after a considerable data leakage at Digitex that uncovered confidential user data, Todd declared the discontinuation of all KYC checks. Willingly, Todd made this choice despite the platform‚Äôs earlier assertions that U.S. IPs were blocked and that users would have to confirm that they were not located in the United States.

Notably, according to the U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office, Todd‚Äôs guilty plea could result in a potential sentence of up to five years in prison and a fine of $250,000. The sentencing will be determined by a federal district court judge, who will consider the U.S. Sentencing Guidelines and other pertinent factors.
Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao faced similar charges in a different federal district and pleaded guilty in November 2023, receiving a four-month prison sentence in April.
While there is no confirmed date for Todd‚Äôs sentencing hearing, his LinkedIn profile indicates that he stepped down as CEO of Digitex Futures Exchange in October 2022.
Adam Todd Faces Legal Actions, Including Default Judgment by CFTC
Todd‚Äôs indictment follows a series of legal actions against him, including a default judgment issued by the Commodities Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) seven months prior.

In July 2023, Judge Roy Altman of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida granted a permanent injunction against Todd and four companies under his control, including Digitex Futures Exchange. This injunction stemmed from allegations that Todd attempted to manipulate the price of the platform‚Äôs native token, DGTX, using a computerized bot.

The charges against Todd and his companies included illegally offering futures transactions on a platform not designated as a contract market, failure to register with the CFTC, and neglecting to implement customer information programs, Know Your Customer (KYC) procedures, and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) procedures.

The court‚Äôs order prohibited Todd and his firms from registering with the CFTC and trading in any CFTC-regulated markets. Additionally, the court ordered Todd to pay a $3.9 million disgorgement and a $11.7 million civil monetary penalty, effectively resolving the CFTC‚Äôs enforcement action against the entities.

title: Celestia‚Äôs TIA Price Falls 5%, as Capital Shifts to Upcoming Solana Meme Coin
author: Tim Hakki

elements: Celestia‚Äôs TIA Price Falls 5%, as Capital Shifts to Upcoming Solana Meme Coin
Celestia‚Äôs $TIA has fallen more than 5% in the last 24 hours to trade at $9.44 as of this writing.
TIA is the native token powering Celestia‚Äôs modular data availability blockchain, a new solution to the problem of scalability.
Celestia stems from British cybersecurity expert Mustafa Al-Bassam‚Äôs 2019 whitepaper, LazyLedger.

His goal was to create a blockchain ledger that doesn‚Äôt do any computation or execution, it just focuses on consensus and making transaction data on the ledger available for anyone to access and verify.
By outsourcing execution tasks to rollups and Layer 2s, Celestia claims it has found a potential solution to blockchain‚Äôs classic trilemma.
That‚Äôs the idea that improvements in a blockchain‚Äôs decentralization, security or scaleability necessarily result in compromises in the other categories.
Celestia‚Äôs intraday losses continue a two-week losing streak that has plunged TIA by 20%.
The token appears to be tracking broader market movements today. It is currently exaggerating losses posted by market leaders Bitcoin ($BTC) and Ethereum ($ETH).
Bitcoin fell 3.2% over the last 24 hours and currently trades at $62,708. Nearest rival Ethereum fell 4.1% over the same period and changes hands at $2,993.

Ethereum‚Äôs number one competitor as the blockchain for apps and DeFi, Solana ($SOL), posted heavier intraday losses of 8.1%, although at $145.71, that‚Äôs still about 20% pricier than it was this time last week.
Celestia‚Äôs trading chart shows a token that has been in steady 55% decline since setting a new all-time high of $20.85 on February 10.
However, in spite of this, it has weathered crypto‚Äôs headwinds well. It bottomed out above $8 before spending late April/early May seesawing between $9 and $12.
A relative strength index (RSI) of 34 and falling indicates a continuing selloff.
This is likely to depreciate the token further in the short-term.
Celestia‚Äôs $TIA Doesn‚Äôt Pump Like Meme Coins

With a market cap of nearly $2 billion Celestia‚Äôs $TIA is the 60th biggest cryptocurrency in the world right now. It‚Äôs also one of several eye-catching protocols ushering in a new generation of scalability.

That said, it appears to be a little more volatile than the market leaders. Most cryptocurrencies this year rallied in step with Bitcoin and posted all-time or recent highs in early-to-mid March while TIA had peaked in early February.

Investors wanting to track market movements are perhaps better served by the plethora of exciting new meme coins. By buying in early during the presale, crypto fans can advantage of some sweltering price pumps if their token goes viral on listing.

title: SEC Argues for Injunctions in Final Response of Ripple XRP Case
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: SEC Argues for Injunctions in Final Response of Ripple XRP Case

Ripple Labs and the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) have made significant progress in their ongoing legal battle as the SEC filed its final reply in the lawsuit‚Äôs remedies stage.

In its recent response to the remedies brief, the SEC challenged Ripple‚Äôs assertion that the blockchain startup acted without recklessness and that there should be no ‚Äúwidespread uncertainty‚Äù about XRP‚Äôs legal status, despite the court previously rejecting this ‚Äúfair notice‚Äù defense. The SEC also maintains its stance on the likelihood of Ripple engaging in similar actions in the future.
SEC Argues Against Ripple‚Äôs Cooperation Claims

The remedies brief states that Ripple has tried to minimize its liability while highlighting its cooperation with the SEC since the 2013 XRP initial coin offering. However, the SEC has stressed that, per the law, another breach remains possible even if Ripple has abstained from violations since 2020.

The SEC asserts that Ripple‚Äôs pledges to alter its conduct following the lawsuit do not warrant the avoidance of injunctions. It argues that Ripple doesn‚Äôt understand the court order and fails to acknowledge its ramifications for compliance.

And just when you think the SEC can‚Äôt sink any lower, if you are a financial regulator outside the U.S. and have done the hard work of establishing comprehensive crypto licensing frameworks, know that the SEC has no respect for you and thinks you are handing out the equivalent of‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7qZQIkyrH4
‚Äî Stuart Alderoty (@s_alderoty) May 7, 2024

The SEC‚Äôs response challenges Ripple‚Äôs assertions regarding sales conducted outside the United States and to accredited investors. In response to the SEC‚Äôs arguments in the remedies brief, Ripple‚Äôs chief legal officer, Stuart Alderoty, spoke on the SEC‚Äôs declining reputation.

‚ÄúIf you are a financial regulator outside the U.S. and have done the hard work of establishing comprehensive crypto licensing frameworks, know that the SEC has no respect for you and thinks you are handing out the equivalent of fishing licenses.‚Äù

He pointed out that international financial regulators with robust crypto licensing frameworks might find the SEC‚Äôs efforts surprising, likening them to issuing fishing licenses. Alderoty criticized the commission for its inconsistent application of the law and expressed optimism about resolving the XRP lawsuit.Despite Ripple‚Äôs claims of acting without recklessness and minimizing uncertainty about XRP‚Äôs legal status, the SEC maintains its position and questions the likelihood of Ripple engaging in similar actions.
Ripple Has Opposed A $2 Billion Penalty Fine Before And Most Of The Allegations

Ripple recently opposed the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)‚Äôs request for a $2 billion penalty, arguing that the proposed fines are disproportionate and punitive. Through its defense lawyer, James Filan, the company filed a detailed motion disputing the SEC‚Äôs penalty demands, suggesting a much lower penalty of $10 million instead.The opposition emphasizes that the SEC‚Äôs proposed penalties are not in line with the actual circumstances of the case. Ripple contends that no allegations or findings of reckless behavior or fraudulent activity would justify such severe financial penalties. Additionally, Ripple asserts that its XRP sales were conducted transparently and with knowledgeable institutional investors who were fully informed about the transactions.Ripple highlights its significant legal victories throughout the litigation, suggesting that the SEC‚Äôs penalty demands are inconsistent with the court‚Äôs findings. The company argues that the SEC‚Äôs request is evidence of ongoing intimidation against the crypto industry in the United States, particularly considering the lack of allegations of recklessness or fraud in the case.Ripple proposes a much lower penalty of $10 million, which is more appropriate given the nature of the alleged violations and the company‚Äôs conduct. Ripple contends that this amount would adequately serve the legal interests without being disproportionately punitive.According to analysts, the case is expected to reach a final judgment around September. The court will decide on penalties, and Ripple expresses confidence in the judge‚Äôs fair approach to the final remedies phase.

title: What‚Äôs Happening In Crypto Today? Daily Crypto News Digest
author: Sead Fadilpa≈°iƒá

elements: What‚Äôs Happening In Crypto Today? Daily Crypto News Digest
Get your daily, bite-sized digest of blockchain and crypto news today ‚Äì investigating the stories flying under the radar of today‚Äôs news.
In crypto news today:
Why is crypto up today?
The global cryptocurrency market capitalization today is down 3.3% over the past 24 hours. It stands at $2.41 trillion.
Only five out of the top 100 coins per market cap have seen their prices increase today.
The leader here is THORChain (RUNE) with a rise of 3.2% to $5.57.
Next is Lido DAO (LDO). Its price appreciated 2.7% to $2.
LEO, TRX, and ENA are also up today.At the same time, Dogwifhat (WIF) fell the most: 10.9% to $2.93. It‚Äôs followed by Injective (INJ), with a drop of 8.3% to $23.67.
When it comes to the top 10 coins, all are down today.
The Reddest among them is Solana (SOL). It recorded a 7% drop, trading at $146.

Dogecoin (DOGE) is next in line, having decreased by 6.7% to $0.14835.The remaining coins are all down between 1.6% and 3.6%. Bitcoin (BTC)‚Äôs price declined by 2.4%, currently changing hands at $62,330.

Ethereum (ETH) dropped 3.2%, trading at $3,006.Meanwhile, BTC has shown uncharacteristically low volatility over the past year. This is despite it hitting record-high prices. According to Fidelity Investments research analyst Zack Wainwright, this period of calm suggests that Bitcoin may be poised for a significant price surge soon.
BTC-e Operator Pleads Guilty to Money Laundering
In crypto news today, Russian national Alexander Vinnik, one of the operators of the crypto exchange BTC-e, pleaded guilty in the US to conspiracy to commit money laundering.

According to the US Department of Justice, from 2011 to 2017, BTC-e processed over $9 billion worth of transactions and served over one million users worldwide. This includes ‚Äúnumerous customers‚Äù in the United States. However, it was not registered in this country.
Furthermore, cybercriminals around the world used BTC-e to transfer, launder, and store criminal proceeds, said the announcement.
This includes proceeds from ‚Äúnumerous computer intrusions and hacking incidents, ransomware attacks, identity theft schemes, corrupt public officials, and narcotics distribution rings.‚Äù
Alexander Vinnik owned & operated one of the world's largest virtual currency exchanges, BTC-e.
From 2011 to 2017, it processed > $9 *billion* of transactions and served as a hub for criminals to launder their crypto.
Today, Vinnik pleaded guilty in SF federal court. https://t.co/j1tOplvJEE
‚Äî U.S. Attorney NorCal (@USAO_NDCA) May 3, 2024
The announcement added that ‚ÄúVinnik operated BTC-e with the intent to promote these unlawful activities and was responsible for a loss amount of at least $121 million.‚Äù
Additionally, he set up many shell companies and financial accounts across the world to allow BTC-e to conduct its business.
Vinnik was initially arrested in 2017 in Greece at the request of the US. In 2020, he was first extradited to France to face criminal charges, then back to Greece before arriving in the US.
A federal district court judge will determine a sentence.
Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco remarked that this ‚Äúresult shows how the Justice Department, working with international partners, reaches across the globe to combat crypto crime.‚Äù
Nigeria Moving Towards Another Crypto Ban

Nigeria‚Äôs Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)‚Äôs director-general Emomotimi Agama said that the commission held a meeting with local crypto exchanges on Monday to express ‚Äúconcerns regarding crypto peer-to-peer traders and their effect on the naira,‚Äù Semafor reported.

Agama stated that the country wants its currency naira to be delisted from trading platforms, as well as crypto exchanges‚Äô compliance with regulations that will be released ‚Äúin the coming days,‚Äù he said.
Meanwhile, TechCabal reported on Friday that at least three Nigerian fintech startups will block the accounts of customers dealing in crypto. These include Moniepoint, Paga, and Palmpay.

The decision comes after the National Security Adviser (NSA) classified crypto trading as a national security issue. The designation ‚Äúmeans a new crypto regulation that will ban peer-to-peer trading of cryptocurrencies is in the works,‚Äù the report cited Moniepoint CEO Tosin Eniolorunda as saying.
Additionally, at least two platforms warned customers that trading cryptocurrency will lead to account closures and being reported to law enforcement authorities.

On Monday, Moniepoint told its customers that it would close crypto trading accounts in compliance with regulations by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Semafor said. Similarly, the Chinese-backed digital banking provider OPay issued a warning as well.
Important Noticeüìå#OPayBeyondBanking pic.twitter.com/YcDWRxw4oz
‚Äî OPay (@OPay_NG) May 3, 2024
Per various reports, Nigerian authorities are accusing crypto exchanges of encouraging inflated demand for the dollar against the country‚Äôs own currency.
Meanwhile, the CBN lifted a ban in December that had been placed on crypto trading in 2021.
At the time, it suggested it would issue licenses for trading virtual assets. It hasn‚Äôt issued a single license yet.
Rather, it seems to be moving in the opposite direction.
Two weeks ago, Kuda Bank and Palmpay also paused account opening for new customers following a directive from the Central Bank, TechCabal reported.
On Thursday, Tosin Eniolorunda, the CEO of Moniepoint, confirmed that the NSA ordered the pause in new customer signups, TechCabal added in a separate report.
MetaComp and Bosera Strengthen Partnership to Promote Bosera Crypto ETFs Worldwide

In other crypto news today, Singapore-based digital asset platform MetaComp and Bosera Fund Management will be working together to introduce the Bosera cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to investors worldwide.
According to the press release, Bosera International and HashKey Capital Limited have jointly launched the Bosera HashKey Bitcoin ETF and the Bosera HashKey Ethereum ETF this year.

Both began trading on April 30 on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, attracting ‚Äúsignificant attention from international regulators and the global investment community since their announcement.‚Äù Now, MetaComp and its affiliate will lead the promotion of the ETFs to investors in Singapore and globally by leveraging their proprietary Client Assets Management Platform, CAMP, and their technical and market expertise.
We're excited to share that @MetaCompSG and Bosera International are teaming up to introduce the Bosera @HashKey_Capital Cryptocurrency ETF to investors worldwide!https://t.co/AVQdJhMjS2
‚Äî MetaComp (@MetaCompSG) May 8, 2024

Also, the two parties plan to explore the integration of Bosera‚Äôs asset management solutions into MetaComp‚Äôs CAMP platform to ‚Äúempower investors with a comprehensive suite of financial tools.‚Äù
Furthermore, MetaComp aims to extend its digital payment token services to Bosera to enhance the latter‚Äôs digital asset management capabilities, it said.
Bai Bo, Chairman and Co-founder of MetaComp, commented that the partners ‚Äújointly launch a series of innovative solutions in both traditional and cryptocurrency finance.‚Äù

title: ChainGPT Pad launches Engines of Fury, bringing enhanced Web3 gaming experiences to mainstream players

elements: ChainGPT Pad launches Engines of Fury, bringing enhanced Web3 gaming experiences to mainstream players

Dover, DE, USA, May8, 2024 ‚Äî ChainGPT, the AI-powered Web3 infrastructure providing a diverse suite of tools and services, will exclusively launch the IDO of its latest launchpad project, Engines of Fury: a free-to-play top-down extraction shooter designed for Web3. Developed by talents from AAA titles, Blizzard, Activision, Ubisoft, and Unity, its top-down characteristic makes it a first within Web3‚Äôs free-to-play shooter arena. Set for May 8, Engines of Fury‚Äôs IDO leverages ChainGPT Pad‚Äôs acceleration program enabling the game to perfect its product systems, action plans, and roadmaps while receiving expert marketing and promotional support.

As a premier decentralized fundraising and incubation platform for Web3 projects of all types, the ChainGPT Pad has been recognized as the most popular launchpad of 2023. The incubation program promotes emerging startups strategically hand-picked by ChainGPT based on their disruptive potential, transforming their ideas into viable business solutions. The program extensively assists in product development, smart contract implementation, and user engagement. Through expert mentorship and access to an extensive network of influential partners and investors, the ChainGPT Pad‚Äôs incubation provides Web3 startups the tools to navigate inevitable challenges and thrive.

Engines of Fury immerses players in a dystopian world ravaged by a mutagenic virus from a meteor. Gamers navigate a perilous universe‚Äîscavenging for resources, enhancing hideouts, and upgrading gear while honing their abilities through single-player and cooperative modes. With a robust in-game economy driven by its native $FURY token, the game emphasizes a journey of survival, craftsmanship, and community. Engines of Fury‚Äôs goal is to create a game that introduces mainstream players to the distinct advantages of blockchain, without forcing Web3 elements into core aspects of gameplay.

Making it simple for all players to jump into the game, Engines of Fury‚Äôs crypto aspects serve as a bonus, not a must. The game includes classic gaming elements with an easy onboarding process for non-crypto natives, with features such as:

With an overwhelming response, Engines of Fury attracted over 80,000 applications for its Private Alpha Test, extending the game‚Äôs original playtest deadline. The enthusiasm following the private alpha test underscores the demand for high-quality Web3 gaming experiences.
Engines of Fury IDO information:

title: Eight Tips for Beginning Traders

elements: Eight Tips for Beginning Traders

There is no denying that the capital market can be a lucrative venture for those who know how to navigate it successfully. However, for beginners, forex trading can be overwhelming and confusing. With so many variables to consider, new traders need to have a solid foundation to build upon. Here are eight tips for beginning traders to help them get started on the right foot.
Education

Before jumping into forex trading, take the time to educate yourself on how the market works, the different types of trading strategies, and the risks involved. There are plenty of resources available online, including books, webinars, and tutorials, that can help beginners gain a better understanding of the forex market.

Many forex brokers have an education section on their forex trading app or website where traders can access resources to help them learn about trading techniques, market analysis, risk management, and other important concepts related to forex trading. These educational materials may include video tutorials, webinars, articles, trading guides, and interactive tools to help traders improve their knowledge and skills.

In addition to the educational materials brokers provide, some trading platforms also offer demo accounts where traders can practice trading with virtual money in a simulated trading environment. This situation allows beginners to gain practical experience executing trades, managing positions, and testing different trading strategies without risking real money.

Overall, the education section on a broker‚Äôs trading platform can be a valuable resource for beginner traders looking to enhance their understanding of forex trading and improve their trading performance. Traders must use these educational materials and resources to build a strong foundation in forex trading and increase their chances of success in the market.
Start Small

When starting in forex trading, you must start small and only risk money you can afford to lose. This technique will help you gain experience and confidence in your trading abilities without the pressure of losing significant amounts of money. Starting small when you are a beginning trader offers several benefits that can help you build a solid foundation and increase your chances of long-term success in forex trading.

Trading with a small account allows you to gain practical experience executing trades, managing positions, and testing different trading strategies. This hands-on experience is essential for beginner traders to learn how the forex market works, understand market dynamics, and develop their trading skills over time. It also helps you identify what works best for you and refine your trading approach as you gain more experience.

Trading can be a highly emotional experience, with fear, greed, and anxiety often influencing trading decisions. Starting small helps you manage these emotions and stay disciplined in your trading approach. With a smaller account size, you may feel less pressured to make risky or impulsive trading decisions, allowing you to stay focused on your trading plan and avoid emotional reactions that can lead to poor trading outcomes.

Starting small can help you build confidence in your trading abilities and a winning mindset. As you make successful trades and see your account grow gradually, you will gain confidence in your trading skills and decision-making abilities. This positive reinforcement can boost your self-assurance and motivate you to continue improving and growing as a trader.

Trading with a small account allows you to experiment with different trading strategies and risk levels without significant financial consequences. This technique will enable you to adapt to changing market conditions, test new approaches, and refine your trading plan. By starting small, you can identify what works best for you and tailor your trading approach to suit your individual goals and risk tolerance.
Choose the Right Broker:

Selecting the right forex broker is crucial to your success as a trader. Look for a well-regulated, transparent broker that offers competitive spreads and leverage. Choosing a broker that offers a user-friendly trading platform that suits your trading style is also essential.

The forex market is decentralized and operates 24 hours a day, which can make it susceptible to fraud and scams. A regulated broker is authorized by a financial regulatory authority to offer brokerage services, which provides an extra layer of security and ensures that the broker complies with strict regulations and standards. Beginners should choose a broker regulated by a reputable regulatory body to protect their funds and provide a safe trading environment.

Brokers offer varying trading conditions, such as spreads, leverage, and commissions. Beginning traders should look for a broker that offers competitive and transparent trading conditions to minimize trading costs and maximize potential profits. When choosing a broker, it‚Äôs essential to consider factors such as spread size, leverage options, account types, and trading platforms.

Reliable customer support is essential for beginners who have questions or issues while trading. A broker that offers responsive customer support through multiple channels, such as phone, email, and live chat, can assist and address concerns promptly. Good customer support can help beginners navigate the trading platform, resolve technical issues, and access educational resources.

The trading platform provided by the broker is the primary tool through which traders execute trades, analyze market data, and manage their positions. Beginners should choose a broker that offers a user-friendly and feature-rich trading platform that meets their trading needs. A well-designed trading platform can enhance the trading experience, facilitate efficient trade execution, and provide access to advanced trading tools and indicators.

Many brokers offer educational resources, such as trading guides, webinars, and tutorials, to help beginners improve their trading knowledge and skills. Choosing a broker with comprehensive educational materials can benefit new traders by offering valuable insights into market analysis, trading strategies, risk management, and other essential aspects of forex trading.

The reputation and reliability of a broker are important considerations for beginning traders. Researching and reading reviews from other traders can help assess a broker‚Äôs reputation and determine whether they are trustworthy and reliable. A reputable broker with a positive track record will likely provide beginners with a secure and fair trading environment.
Develop a Trading Plan

Before making any trades, developing a trading plan outlining your trading goals, risk tolerance, and strategies is crucial. A solid plan will help you stay focused and disciplined in trading decisions.

A trading plan helps beginners clarify their trading objectives and focus on achieving their goals in the forex market. By outlining specific trading goals, entry and exit criteria, risk tolerance levels, and trading strategies, a trading plan provides a clear direction for traders to follow. It keeps you on track with trading activities.

Consistency and discipline are critical traits for successful trading. A trading plan helps beginners establish rules and guidelines for trading activities. By adhering to the regulations outlined in the trading plan, traders can maintain consistency in their trading approach and avoid impulsive or emotional trading decisions that may lead to losses.

Effective risk management is a vital component of a trading plan. By defining risk parameters, such as stop-loss levels, position sizing, and risk-reward ratios, beginners can protect their trading capital and minimize potential losses. A trading plan helps traders manage risk effectively and maintain a balanced risk-reward profile in their trading decisions.

A trading plan allows beginners to develop and test different trading strategies to identify what works best. By outlining specific entry and exit criteria, trade setups, and risk management rules, traders can refine their trading strategies and optimize their trading performance over time. A trading plan serves as a valuable tool for strategy development and improvement.
Practice with a Demo Account

Most forex brokers offer demo accounts that allow you to practice trading with virtual money. This product is an excellent way for beginners to get a feel for the market and test different trading strategies without risking any real money.

Demo accounts simulate trading. Demo accounts create a risk-free real market trading environment, allowing individuals to experience the capital markets trading environment without risking real capital. Forex market without risking actual money.

One of the primary benefits of demo accounts is that they allow traders to practice trading without risking their capital. Since demo accounts use virtual money, traders can experiment with different trading approaches, learn from their mistakes, and refine their strategies without incurring financial losses. This situation provides a low-pressure environment for beginners to build confidence and skills before transitioning to live trading.
Keep Your Emotions in Check

Trading can be an emotional rollercoaster, with highs and lows that can cloud judgment. Staying disciplined and sticking to your trading plan, even when the market is moving against you, is essential. Don‚Äôt let fear or greed dictate your trading decisions.
Stay Informed

The forex market is constantly changing, with economic indicators, geopolitical events, and central bank decisions all impacting currency prices. As a beginner trader, staying informed about current market trends and news that could affect your trades is important. Follow reputable financial news sources and stay up-to-date on market analysis to make informed trading decisions.
The Bottom Line

In conclusion, forex trading can be a challenging but rewarding endeavor for beginners. Following these eight tips for beginning forex traders, you can start your trading journey on the right track and increase your chances of success in the dynamic and ever-changing forex market. Remember to educate yourself, start small, choose the right broker, develop a trading plan, practice with a demo account, manage your risk, keep your emotions in check, and stay informed. With dedication, discipline, and a willingness to learn, beginner forex traders can build a solid foundation for long-term trading success.

title: AI Predicts China Will Ban High-Energy Blockchains
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: AI Predicts China Will Ban High-Energy Blockchains
China, known for its significant share of the global cryptocurrency mining industry, has been grappling with the environmental ramifications of its burgeoning blockchain sector.
With concerns over carbon emissions and energy consumption on the rise, regulatory bodies are under pressure to address these issues.

In a bid to understand the future landscape of this burgeoning sector, we consulted three leading AI platforms‚ÄîChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Microsoft Copilot‚Äîto predict the fate of eco-friendly digital currencies, often termed ‚Äúgreen cryptocurrencies.‚Äù
Regulations on Big Crypto Energy
The focus on sustainability has prompted governments worldwide to scrutinize the environmental impact of cryptocurrencies.
Forthcoming regulations are expected to center on reducing the energy consumption of these technologies, with potential restrictions placed on high-energy blockchains.
Green cryptocurrencies are those that utilize blockchain technology to ensure a significantly reduced carbon footprint.
This is primarily achieved through the Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which requires far less energy than the traditional Proof of Work (PoW) system used by platforms like Bitcoin.
Examples of green cryptocurrencies include Cardano, Algorand, and Tezos, which promise a more sustainable approach to digital transactions and asset management.
Bitcoin Price Prediction
Bitcoin, the first and most famous cryptocurrency, faces increasing scrutiny due to its significant energy demands and consequent carbon emissions.
A single Bitcoin transaction consumes over 705 kWh of electricity, according to Digiconomist. This is enough to power an average U.S. household for about 60 days.

A single bitcoin transaction consumes more electricity than a US household in a month. A query on ChatGPT uses 10 times more electricity than a Google search. Moving all internet queries to AI will consume as much electricity as Ireland does in a year https://t.co/5pq6n1E9cZ
‚Äî Reveal IT Ireland (@RevealITIreland) April 4, 2024

While Bitcoin has shown resilience and adaptability, the increasing focus on green technologies might influence its price and the broader investor landscape, potentially driving a shift towards more sustainable alternatives.
China to Ban High-Energy Blockchains
On the global stage, the response to the crypto energy crisis varies. Countries like Sweden and Iceland have embraced green crypto mining thanks to their abundant renewable energy sources.

Conversely, China, once a powerhouse in the crypto mining world, is predicted to implement a ban on high-energy blockchains in a decisive move to curb the environmental degradation linked to these activities.
This looming ban could set a precedent, urging other nations to consider similar restrictions or to adopt more sustainable practices in the cryptocurrency mining industry.

The collective shift towards green crypto could redefine the economic and environmental landscape of digital finance, presenting a new paradigm where technology and sustainability are no longer at odds but are intertwined for global betterment.

title: Six Arrested in Connection with Austrian Crypto Fraud Scheme, ‚Ç¨2M Worth of Assets Frozen
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: Six Arrested in Connection with Austrian Crypto Fraud Scheme, ‚Ç¨2M Worth of Assets Frozen

A joint operation involving national authorities from Austria, Cyprus, and the Czech Republic has led to the arrest of six individuals connected to an online scam related to the sale of rights or tokens for a supposed new cryptocurrency.
Supported by Eurojust and Europol, the coordinated action resulted in the seizure and freezing of assets totaling ‚Ç¨2 million, according to an official announcement.
The operation included the execution of search warrants and the apprehension of the main suspects, the report said.
Scammers Posed as Legitimate Trading Company

The fraudulent scheme took place between December 2017 and February 2018, during which the scammers posed as operators of a legitimate online trading company that had allegedly launched a new cryptocurrency.
They offered 10 million tokens or rights to the new currency for sale, accepting payments in established cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum.
To gain credibility with investors, the fraudsters claimed to have developed their own software and algorithm for token sales.
However, in February 2018, the perpetrators abruptly closed all their social media accounts and took down the fake company‚Äôs website, executing what is commonly known as an exit scam.
This move exposed the fact that investors had been deceived, resulting in losses estimated at around ‚Ç¨6 million.
Not all victims of the fraud have been identified at this stage.

The report said that Eurojust played a crucial role in supporting the operation against the online scam by establishing a coordination center to facilitate real-time communication among the participating authorities.
This enabled the swift execution of European Arrest Warrants and search warrants.
Europol also contributed to the operation by deploying a mobile office in Cyprus and organizing operational meetings.
Additionally, they worked closely with the Austrian desk at Eurojust to provide a comprehensive analysis of the investigation.
Instagram Influencer ‚ÄòJay Mazini‚Äô Sentenced to 7 Years in Prison
In another incident, Instagram influencer Jebara Igbara, known as ‚ÄúJay Mazini,‚Äù has been sentenced to seven years in prison for orchestrating a multi-million dollar crypto Ponzi scheme.
JUST IN: Jebara Igbara, AKA 'Jay Mazini,' Sentenced to 7 Years in Prison for Crypto-Related Fraud pic.twitter.com/9r8dEvdq1J
‚Äî BitMemes Daily (@daily_bitmeme) April 25, 2024

Igbara, a 28-year-old from New Jersey, pleaded guilty to fraud charges, confessing to running a Ponzi scheme that involved cryptocurrency fraud and resulted in approximately $8 million in illicit gains.
The money was used to fund an extravagant lifestyle, including luxury cars and excessive gambling.
More recently, Queensland Police took action against an alleged crypto investment fraud operating on the Gold Coast, resulting in the arrest and charging of four individuals.
The investigation, led by the Financial and Cyber Crime Group Money Laundering Unit, began in July 2022.

The search focused on companies including Crypto Advisers Australia, Strategic Capital, Active Marketing Solutions, and Alternative Capital, which were suspected of engaging in fraud and money laundering activities.
As reported, the first quarter of this year has seen $336 million lost to Web3 hackers and fraud, with nearly half of the capital stolen in January alone.

title: Bitpanda Expands Partnership with Raiffeisen to 55 Additional Banks
author: Sead Fadilpa≈°iƒá

elements: Bitpanda Expands Partnership with Raiffeisen to 55 Additional Banks
Major European Investing-as-a-Service provider Bitpanda Technology Solutions has expanded its partnership with banking giant Raiffeisen.
Now, customers of the Raiffeisen banks in Burgenland and Lower Austria will be able to invest in cryptocurrencies and other digital assets via Bitpanda through the mobile banking app Mein ELBA.
This is in addition to customers of Raiffeisenlandesbank N√ñ-Wien in Vienna who have been able to utilize this offer.
Therefore, the partnership with Bitpanda Technology Solutions will be rolled out to an additional 55 Raiffeisen banks.
Through this existing banking app, customers in both Burgenland and Lower Austria now have ‚Äúsecure and easy access‚Äù to over 2,000 digital assets, said the press release today.

Today, Raiffeisenlandesbank Nieder√∂sterreich-Wien became the first major traditional European bank to offer direct investment in digital assets, made possible through the partnership with Bitpanda Technology Solutions.
Learn more about this historic partnership:‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/H3r19TwWl5
‚Äî Bitpanda (@Bitpanda_global) January 25, 2024
The partners offer the service specifically to users who want to invest ‚Äúdigitally and independently‚Äù in crypto, precious metals, and other asset classes via Mein ELBA.
‚ÄúThe user-friendly white-label integration from Bitpanda Technology Solutions enables ‚Äútrading for all‚Äù in the truest sense of the word,‚Äù Bitpanda says.
It provides a clear and comprehensible overview of all assets within the app.
Therefore, both new investors and experienced traders can benefit from the customized service.
New Milestones and Rise in Customer Demand
This latest news follows the success of the collaboration with RLB N√ñ-Wien, announced in January.

Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, CEO of Bitpanda Technology Solutions, stated that this partnership is ‚Äúa perfect example of what banks can achieve when they approach projects with ambition and an innovative perspective.‚Äù
Notably, since the joint launch with Raiffeisenlandesbank Nieder√∂sterreich-Vienna in January, Bitpanda recorded ‚Äúa significant increase in customer demand.‚Äù

Dank dieser Partnerschaft wird Bitpanda Tech die RLB N√ñ-Wien bei ihren kontinuierlichen Bem√ºhungen unterst√ºtzen, Wachstum und Innovation im Sinne der Kunden zu erm√∂glichen und sich als Vorreiter unter den traditionsreichen europ√§ischen Banken zu etablieren.
‚Äî Bitpanda (@Bitpanda) April 26, 2023
Now, with this latest expansion, ‚Äúa new milestone has been set,‚Äù commented Rudolf Suttner, CEO of RLB Burgenland.
‚ÄúWith the integration of Bitpanda into the Mein ELBA app, we are one of the first traditional banks in Europe to enable trading in digital assets,‚Äù he said.
The bank‚Äôs aim was to create ‚Äúabsolute customer centricity,‚Äù and this cooperation has enabled just that.
Their customers can ‚Äúinnovatively and independently‚Äù invest in crypto and other Bitpanda asset classes from anywhere, anytime, for as little as EUR 1.
By integrating Bitpanda into the app, ‚Äúwe have created an innovative investment solution that we hope will also inspire new customers,‚Äù Suttner said.
For Bitpanda, too, this partnership expansion is an important milestone, it said.
The company added that it has over four million users and is heavily regulated.

It holds a MiFID II investment firm license and an E-money license under PSD II. It also has several crypto licenses and registrations as a provider of virtual assets in Austria, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, and other countries.
Meanwhile, Bitpanda recently announced an operations expansion to the Middle East. It is opening a regional office in the United Arab Emirates.
Former 1inch Network‚Äôs business development and head of growth, Walid Benothman, will lead its operations in the region.

title: Crypto Scam Update: Stolen $71M WBTC Loot Distributed Among Multiple Wallets
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: Crypto Scam Update: Stolen $71M WBTC Loot Distributed Among Multiple Wallets
Stolen crypto funds tied to a recent $71 million wallet impersonation scam have started moving after six days.
On May 3, an investor fell victim to a wallet poisoning scam, sending $71 million worth of Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) to a bait wallet address.
The scammer created a wallet address with similar alphanumeric characters, tricking the victim into transferring 97% of their assets.

Typically, investors validate wallet addresses by matching the first and last few characters, but fail to notice discrepancies in the middle characters that are often hidden on platforms for visual appeal.
In this case, the difference would have been noticeable if carefully examined.
Hacker Converts Stolen WBTC to ETH
The hacker behind the scam swiftly converted the stolen WBTC into approximately 23,000 ETH, a common tactic used to make siphoning easier through privacy protocols like Tornado Cash.
The converted funds remained dormant in the scammer‚Äôs wallet for six days.
On May 8, blockchain investigation firm PeckShield observed the movements of the stolen funds.
The scammer began splitting the loot into multiple parts and distributing them across several crypto wallets.

#PeckShieldAlert #Layering The scammer who grabbed ~$71 million worth of $WBTC via a poisoning #scam has laundered the stolen funds (~23K $ETH) by sending and spreading them across a large number of wallets. https://t.co/Blnw5TMT99 pic.twitter.com/CATCb6t1LL
‚Äî PeckShieldAlert (@PeckShieldAlert) May 8, 2024
To reduce traceability, around 400 wallets were used, ultimately leading to over 150 wallets holding the stolen funds.
However, at the time of writing, the stolen funds can still be traced back to the unknown scammer
Throughout history, crypto scammers and hackers have been particularly active during bullish market conditions.
It is crucial for investors to educate themselves on secure cryptocurrency storage practices. Cointelegraph provides a learners‚Äô guide on how to safely store cryptocurrencies.
In another type of scam, bad actors have devised a technique to drain users‚Äô wallets without requiring transaction approval.
This particular scam targets tokens that adhere to the ERC-2612 token standard, allowing for ‚Äúgas-less‚Äù transfers or transfers without the need for holding ETH in the wallet.
However, to enable approval-less transactions, users must be deceived into signing a message.
A recent investigation uncovered a Telegram group featuring a fake version of the Collab.Land Telegram verification system, which orchestrated this scam.
April Records Lowest Crypto Hack Losses
The cryptocurrency industry experienced a major downturn in combined losses from hacks and scams in April.
The month saw the lowest combined losses from crypto-related hacks and scams since 2021, with approximately $25.7 million lost to exploits, hacks, and scams.
More specifically, only $25.7 million was lost in attacks throughout the month, marking the lowest amount since CertiK began tracking such data in 2021.
Flash loan attacks accounted for $129,000 in losses, with the largest incident causing $55,000 in damages.
This marked the lowest incidence of flash loan attacks since February 2022, and $4.3 million was lost to exit scams.
As reported, the first quarter of this year has seen $336 million lost to Web3 hackers and fraud, with nearly half of the capital stolen in January alone.
Nonetheless, the number represents a 23% decrease compared to the first quarter of 2023.
It is also worth noting that $73,885,000 has been recovered from stolen Web3 capital in 7 specific situations.

title: Pushd‚Äôs Innovative E-Commerce Model Draws Monero & Zcash for Potential 100X Returns

elements: Pushd‚Äôs Innovative E-Commerce Model Draws Monero & Zcash for Potential 100X Returns

Pushd‚Äôs presale is drawing attention from privacy-centric communities like Monero and Zcash, intrigued by its innovative e-commerce model. With promises of potential 100X returns, these investors are particularly interested in Pushd‚Äôs approach to blending e-commerce with advanced security and anonymity features, proposing a compelling growth trajectory in the burgeoning sector of blockchain-based retail solutions.
Monero Enhances Privacy in Transactions

Monero is widely recognized for its privacy features, offering users anonymity that is rarely available in other cryptocurrencies. Its continuous updates focus on strengthening its privacy protections without compromising on scalability, making it a favored choice for users prioritizing confidentiality in their transactions.

Monero uses ring signatures to provide privacy. This technology mixes a user‚Äôs account keys with public keys from Monero‚Äôs blockchain to create a ‚Äòring‚Äô of signers, making it extremely difficult to identify the actual signer of a transaction. To enhance privacy further, the platform generates random one-time addresses for each transaction on behalf of the recipient. This ensures that transactions are not linked to a common owner or a permanent address on the blockchain.

Introduced in late 2018, Bulletproofs are a type of non-interactive zero-knowledge proof that reduces the size of transactions and, consequently, the fees associated with them. This was a significant improvement that helped make Monero transactions more efficient while maintaining privacy.
Zcash Offers Strong Encryption

Zcash provides strong encryption to secure the details of transactions while still allowing them to be verified under the network‚Äôs consensus rules through its innovative zero-knowledge proof construction. Recent developments in Zcash aim to enhance this feature further, making it even more robust against potential security threats.

Zcash offers the option of ‚Äúshielded‚Äù transactions, which allow for the encryption of transaction information. These transactions use zero-knowledge proofs to validate transactions without revealing information about the sender, receiver or transaction amount. With Zcash, users have the option to disclose transaction details for auditing or compliance purposes. This selective transparency ensures that users can comply with regulatory requirements without compromising overall privacy.
Pushd Leverages Cryptocurrency for E-Commerce Growth

Monero and Zcash enthusiasts are drawn to Pushd‚Äôs innovative e-commerce model, which promises potential 100X returns and is currently priced at just $0.144 in the sixth stage of the presale. This strategic foresight underscores Pushd‚Äòs potential as a leading investment in the burgeoning field of decentralized marketplaces. title: Digitex Founder Pleads Guilty to Failure in Anti-Money Laundering Program Implementation
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: Digitex Founder Pleads Guilty to Failure in Anti-Money Laundering Program Implementation

In an announcement on Tuesday, the U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office for the Southern District of Florida said Todd pleaded guilty to ‚Äúwillfully causing‚Äù Digitex to violate the Bank Secrecy Act. Notably, authorities indicted the former CEO in February.
‚öñÔ∏è Digitex CEO Charged for Illegally Operating Crypto Futures

Digitex crypto futures exchange CEO Adam Colin Todd willfully failed to include an adequate anti-money-laundering (AML) program, a Florida federal court alleged.#CryptoNews #newshttps://t.co/6BZrFGpdTl
‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) February 14, 2024
Former Digitex CEO Adam Todd Pleads Guilty to Violating Bank Secrecy Act

According to the indictment, Todd played an active role in operating an unregulated futures trading platform servicing U.S. customers from 2018 to 2022, failing to implement and maintain AML and Know Your Customer (KYC) programs. Todd is also claimed to have publicly refused to implement KYC policies for Digitex Futures.

In 2020, after a considerable data leakage at Digitex that uncovered confidential user data, Todd declared the discontinuation of all KYC checks. Willingly, Todd made this choice despite the platform‚Äôs earlier assertions that U.S. IPs were blocked and that users would have to confirm that they were not located in the United States.

Notably, according to the U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office, Todd‚Äôs guilty plea could result in a potential sentence of up to five years in prison and a fine of $250,000. The sentencing will be determined by a federal district court judge, who will consider the U.S. Sentencing Guidelines and other pertinent factors.
Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao faced similar charges in a different federal district and pleaded guilty in November 2023, receiving a four-month prison sentence in April.
While there is no confirmed date for Todd‚Äôs sentencing hearing, his LinkedIn profile indicates that he stepped down as CEO of Digitex Futures Exchange in October 2022.
Adam Todd Faces Legal Actions, Including Default Judgment by CFTC
Todd‚Äôs indictment follows a series of legal actions against him, including a default judgment issued by the Commodities Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) seven months prior.

In July 2023, Judge Roy Altman of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida granted a permanent injunction against Todd and four companies under his control, including Digitex Futures Exchange. This injunction stemmed from allegations that Todd attempted to manipulate the price of the platform‚Äôs native token, DGTX, using a computerized bot.

The charges against Todd and his companies included illegally offering futures transactions on a platform not designated as a contract market, failure to register with the CFTC, and neglecting to implement customer information programs, Know Your Customer (KYC) procedures, and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) procedures.

The court‚Äôs order prohibited Todd and his firms from registering with the CFTC and trading in any CFTC-regulated markets. Additionally, the court ordered Todd to pay a $3.9 million disgorgement and a $11.7 million civil monetary penalty, effectively resolving the CFTC‚Äôs enforcement action against the entities.

title: SEC Argues for Injunctions in Final Response of Ripple XRP Case
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: SEC Argues for Injunctions in Final Response of Ripple XRP Case

Ripple Labs and the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) have made significant progress in their ongoing legal battle as the SEC filed its final reply in the lawsuit‚Äôs remedies stage.

In its recent response to the remedies brief, the SEC challenged Ripple‚Äôs assertion that the blockchain startup acted without recklessness and that there should be no ‚Äúwidespread uncertainty‚Äù about XRP‚Äôs legal status, despite the court previously rejecting this ‚Äúfair notice‚Äù defense. The SEC also maintains its stance on the likelihood of Ripple engaging in similar actions in the future.
SEC Argues Against Ripple‚Äôs Cooperation Claims

The remedies brief states that Ripple has tried to minimize its liability while highlighting its cooperation with the SEC since the 2013 XRP initial coin offering. However, the SEC has stressed that, per the law, another breach remains possible even if Ripple has abstained from violations since 2020.

The SEC asserts that Ripple‚Äôs pledges to alter its conduct following the lawsuit do not warrant the avoidance of injunctions. It argues that Ripple doesn‚Äôt understand the court order and fails to acknowledge its ramifications for compliance.

And just when you think the SEC can‚Äôt sink any lower, if you are a financial regulator outside the U.S. and have done the hard work of establishing comprehensive crypto licensing frameworks, know that the SEC has no respect for you and thinks you are handing out the equivalent of‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7qZQIkyrH4
‚Äî Stuart Alderoty (@s_alderoty) May 7, 2024

The SEC‚Äôs response challenges Ripple‚Äôs assertions regarding sales conducted outside the United States and to accredited investors. In response to the SEC‚Äôs arguments in the remedies brief, Ripple‚Äôs chief legal officer, Stuart Alderoty, spoke on the SEC‚Äôs declining reputation.

‚ÄúIf you are a financial regulator outside the U.S. and have done the hard work of establishing comprehensive crypto licensing frameworks, know that the SEC has no respect for you and thinks you are handing out the equivalent of fishing licenses.‚Äù

He pointed out that international financial regulators with robust crypto licensing frameworks might find the SEC‚Äôs efforts surprising, likening them to issuing fishing licenses. Alderoty criticized the commission for its inconsistent application of the law and expressed optimism about resolving the XRP lawsuit.Despite Ripple‚Äôs claims of acting without recklessness and minimizing uncertainty about XRP‚Äôs legal status, the SEC maintains its position and questions the likelihood of Ripple engaging in similar actions.
Ripple Has Opposed A $2 Billion Penalty Fine Before And Most Of The Allegations

Ripple recently opposed the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)‚Äôs request for a $2 billion penalty, arguing that the proposed fines are disproportionate and punitive. Through its defense lawyer, James Filan, the company filed a detailed motion disputing the SEC‚Äôs penalty demands, suggesting a much lower penalty of $10 million instead.The opposition emphasizes that the SEC‚Äôs proposed penalties are not in line with the actual circumstances of the case. Ripple contends that no allegations or findings of reckless behavior or fraudulent activity would justify such severe financial penalties. Additionally, Ripple asserts that its XRP sales were conducted transparently and with knowledgeable institutional investors who were fully informed about the transactions.Ripple highlights its significant legal victories throughout the litigation, suggesting that the SEC‚Äôs penalty demands are inconsistent with the court‚Äôs findings. The company argues that the SEC‚Äôs request is evidence of ongoing intimidation against the crypto industry in the United States, particularly considering the lack of allegations of recklessness or fraud in the case.Ripple proposes a much lower penalty of $10 million, which is more appropriate given the nature of the alleged violations and the company‚Äôs conduct. Ripple contends that this amount would adequately serve the legal interests without being disproportionately punitive.According to analysts, the case is expected to reach a final judgment around September. The court will decide on penalties, and Ripple expresses confidence in the judge‚Äôs fair approach to the final remedies phase.

LEO, TRX, and ENA are also up today.At the same time, Dogwifhat (WIF) fell the most: 10.9% to $2.93. It‚Äôs followed by Injective (INJ), with a drop of 8.3% to $23.67.
When it comes to the top 10 coins, all are down today.
The Reddest among them is Solana (SOL). It recorded a 7% drop, trading at $146.

Dogecoin (DOGE) is next in line, having decreased by 6.7% to $0.14835.The remaining coins are all down between 1.6% and 3.6%. Bitcoin (BTC)‚Äôs price declined by 2.4%, currently changing hands at $62,330.

Ethereum (ETH) dropped 3.2%, trading at $3,006.Meanwhile, BTC has shown uncharacteristically low volatility over the past year. This is despite it hitting record-high prices. According to Fidelity Investments research analyst Zack Wainwright, this period of calm suggests that Bitcoin may be poised for a significant price surge soon.
BTC-e Operator Pleads Guilty to Money Laundering
In crypto news today, Russian national Alexander Vinnik, one of the operators of the crypto exchange BTC-e, pleaded guilty in the US to conspiracy to commit money laundering.

According to the US Department of Justice, from 2011 to 2017, BTC-e processed over $9 billion worth of transactions and served over one million users worldwide. This includes ‚Äúnumerous customers‚Äù in the United States. However, it was not registered in this country.
Furthermore, cybercriminals around the world used BTC-e to transfer, launder, and store criminal proceeds, said the announcement.
This includes proceeds from ‚Äúnumerous computer intrusions and hacking incidents, ransomware attacks, identity theft schemes, corrupt public officials, and narcotics distribution rings.‚Äù
Alexander Vinnik owned & operated one of the world's largest virtual currency exchanges, BTC-e.
From 2011 to 2017, it processed > $9 *billion* of transactions and served as a hub for criminals to launder their crypto.
Today, Vinnik pleaded guilty in SF federal court. https://t.co/j1tOplvJEE
‚Äî U.S. Attorney NorCal (@USAO_NDCA) May 3, 2024
The announcement added that ‚ÄúVinnik operated BTC-e with the intent to promote these unlawful activities and was responsible for a loss amount of at least $121 million.‚Äù
Additionally, he set up many shell companies and financial accounts across the world to allow BTC-e to conduct its business.
Vinnik was initially arrested in 2017 in Greece at the request of the US. In 2020, he was first extradited to France to face criminal charges, then back to Greece before arriving in the US.
A federal district court judge will determine a sentence.
Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco remarked that this ‚Äúresult shows how the Justice Department, working with international partners, reaches across the globe to combat crypto crime.‚Äù
Nigeria Moving Towards Another Crypto Ban

Nigeria‚Äôs Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)‚Äôs director-general Emomotimi Agama said that the commission held a meeting with local crypto exchanges on Monday to express ‚Äúconcerns regarding crypto peer-to-peer traders and their effect on the naira,‚Äù Semafor reported.

Agama stated that the country wants its currency naira to be delisted from trading platforms, as well as crypto exchanges‚Äô compliance with regulations that will be released ‚Äúin the coming days,‚Äù he said.
Meanwhile, TechCabal reported on Friday that at least three Nigerian fintech startups will block the accounts of customers dealing in crypto. These include Moniepoint, Paga, and Palmpay.

The decision comes after the National Security Adviser (NSA) classified crypto trading as a national security issue. The designation ‚Äúmeans a new crypto regulation that will ban peer-to-peer trading of cryptocurrencies is in the works,‚Äù the report cited Moniepoint CEO Tosin Eniolorunda as saying.
Additionally, at least two platforms warned customers that trading cryptocurrency will lead to account closures and being reported to law enforcement authorities.

On Monday, Moniepoint told its customers that it would close crypto trading accounts in compliance with regulations by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Semafor said. Similarly, the Chinese-backed digital banking provider OPay issued a warning as well.
Important Noticeüìå#OPayBeyondBanking pic.twitter.com/YcDWRxw4oz
‚Äî OPay (@OPay_NG) May 3, 2024
Per various reports, Nigerian authorities are accusing crypto exchanges of encouraging inflated demand for the dollar against the country‚Äôs own currency.
Meanwhile, the CBN lifted a ban in December that had been placed on crypto trading in 2021.
At the time, it suggested it would issue licenses for trading virtual assets. It hasn‚Äôt issued a single license yet.
Rather, it seems to be moving in the opposite direction.
Two weeks ago, Kuda Bank and Palmpay also paused account opening for new customers following a directive from the Central Bank, TechCabal reported.
On Thursday, Tosin Eniolorunda, the CEO of Moniepoint, confirmed that the NSA ordered the pause in new customer signups, TechCabal added in a separate report.
MetaComp and Bosera Strengthen Partnership to Promote Bosera Crypto ETFs Worldwide

In other crypto news today, Singapore-based digital asset platform MetaComp and Bosera Fund Management will be working together to introduce the Bosera cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to investors worldwide.
According to the press release, Bosera International and HashKey Capital Limited have jointly launched the Bosera HashKey Bitcoin ETF and the Bosera HashKey Ethereum ETF this year.

Both began trading on April 30 on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, attracting ‚Äúsignificant attention from international regulators and the global investment community since their announcement.‚Äù Now, MetaComp and its affiliate will lead the promotion of the ETFs to investors in Singapore and globally by leveraging their proprietary Client Assets Management Platform, CAMP, and their technical and market expertise.
We're excited to share that @MetaCompSG and Bosera International are teaming up to introduce the Bosera @HashKey_Capital Cryptocurrency ETF to investors worldwide!https://t.co/AVQdJhMjS2
‚Äî MetaComp (@MetaCompSG) May 8, 2024

Also, the two parties plan to explore the integration of Bosera‚Äôs asset management solutions into MetaComp‚Äôs CAMP platform to ‚Äúempower investors with a comprehensive suite of financial tools.‚Äù
Furthermore, MetaComp aims to extend its digital payment token services to Bosera to enhance the latter‚Äôs digital asset management capabilities, it said.
Bai Bo, Chairman and Co-founder of MetaComp, commented that the partners ‚Äújointly launch a series of innovative solutions in both traditional and cryptocurrency finance.‚Äù
