title: ChainGPT Pad launches Engines of Fury, bringing enhanced Web3 gaming experiences to mainstream players

elements: ChainGPT Pad launches Engines of Fury, bringing enhanced Web3 gaming experiences to mainstream players

Dover, DE, USA, May8, 2024 ‚Äî ChainGPT, the AI-powered Web3 infrastructure providing a diverse suite of tools and services, will exclusively launch the IDO of its latest launchpad project, Engines of Fury: a free-to-play top-down extraction shooter designed for Web3. Developed by talents from AAA titles, Blizzard, Activision, Ubisoft, and Unity, its top-down characteristic makes it a first within Web3‚Äôs free-to-play shooter arena. Set for May 8, Engines of Fury‚Äôs IDO leverages ChainGPT Pad‚Äôs acceleration program enabling the game to perfect its product systems, action plans, and roadmaps while receiving expert marketing and promotional support.

As a premier decentralized fundraising and incubation platform for Web3 projects of all types, the ChainGPT Pad has been recognized as the most popular launchpad of 2023. The incubation program promotes emerging startups strategically hand-picked by ChainGPT based on their disruptive potential, transforming their ideas into viable business solutions. The program extensively assists in product development, smart contract implementation, and user engagement. Through expert mentorship and access to an extensive network of influential partners and investors, the ChainGPT Pad‚Äôs incubation provides Web3 startups the tools to navigate inevitable challenges and thrive.

Engines of Fury immerses players in a dystopian world ravaged by a mutagenic virus from a meteor. Gamers navigate a perilous universe‚Äîscavenging for resources, enhancing hideouts, and upgrading gear while honing their abilities through single-player and cooperative modes. With a robust in-game economy driven by its native $FURY token, the game emphasizes a journey of survival, craftsmanship, and community. Engines of Fury‚Äôs goal is to create a game that introduces mainstream players to the distinct advantages of blockchain, without forcing Web3 elements into core aspects of gameplay.

Making it simple for all players to jump into the game, Engines of Fury‚Äôs crypto aspects serve as a bonus, not a must. The game includes classic gaming elements with an easy onboarding process for non-crypto natives, with features such as:

With an overwhelming response, Engines of Fury attracted over 80,000 applications for its Private Alpha Test, extending the game‚Äôs original playtest deadline. The enthusiasm following the private alpha test underscores the demand for high-quality Web3 gaming experiences.
Engines of Fury IDO information:

‚ÄúIt has been a pleasure collaborating with Engines of Fury, who brilliantly blend blockchain-based assets with a high-quality and engaging gaming experience,‚Äù says Ilan Rakhmanov, CEO and Founder of ChainGPT. ‚ÄúEngines of Fury exemplifies the unique and inclusive gaming experiences that resonate with a global audience. Their IDO represented an exciting opportunity for the community to support pioneering projects that reshape the gaming landscape for more than 3.3 billion players worldwide.‚Äù

‚ÄúWith the help of ChainGPT, we‚Äôve crafted a game that serves as a prime example of how gamers and developers can collaborate to build immersive experiences that rival traditional gaming structures,‚Äù says Saulius Aleksa, Co-Founder and CEO of Engines of Fury. We are grateful for the collaboration with the talented team at ChainGPT, whose expertise and invaluable guidance have been instrumental throughout the development of our game.‚Äù
About ChainGPT:

ChainGPT is the leading provider of AI-powered infrastructure for crypto, blockchain, and Web3. From a next-generation IDO launchpad and incubator to automated smart contract generation and auditing as well as an advanced Web3 AI chatbot to AI-powered news aggregation, an AI training assistant, cross-chain swap, and an NFT generator, ChainGPT is a sophisticated, end-to-end solution for AI Web3 infrastructure. By integrating large language models (LLM) with blockchain, the company builds advanced, accessible, and user-friendly tools for all users. Further solidifying its position at the forefront of technological innovation, ChainGPT has established strategic partnerships and received recognition from notable tech leaders such as Google, Nvidia, BNBChain, and Chainlink. ChainGPT aims to advance the use of AI within the blockchain space. For more information, visit: https://www.chaingpt.org/
About Engine Fury:

Built by a talented team from top Web3 projects, AAA titles, Blizzard, Activision, Ubisoft, and Unity, and backed by industry leaders including: Animoca Brands, Metavest Capital, Maven Capital, and Double Peek Group, Engine of Fury is an online survival game that immerses players in a post-apocalyptic world. The game is a free-to-play top-down extraction shooter that combines the thrill of player versus player (PVP) and player versus environment (PVE) gameplay. Engine of Fury incorporates non-fungible tokens (NFTs) into its gameplay, allowing players to own unique digital assets that can be used within the game. These NFTs include unique weapons, armor, and champions that players can use in battle. The game‚Äôs deflationary token, $FURY, is used for various in-game actions, including participating in arenas and forging new NFTs. For more information, visit: https://www.eof.gg/

title: Eight Tips for Beginning Traders

elements: Eight Tips for Beginning Traders

There is no denying that the capital market can be a lucrative venture for those who know how to navigate it successfully. However, for beginners, forex trading can be overwhelming and confusing. With so many variables to consider, new traders need to have a solid foundation to build upon. Here are eight tips for beginning traders to help them get started on the right foot.
Education

Before jumping into forex trading, take the time to educate yourself on how the market works, the different types of trading strategies, and the risks involved. There are plenty of resources available online, including books, webinars, and tutorials, that can help beginners gain a better understanding of the forex market.

Many forex brokers have an education section on their forex trading app or website where traders can access resources to help them learn about trading techniques, market analysis, risk management, and other important concepts related to forex trading. These educational materials may include video tutorials, webinars, articles, trading guides, and interactive tools to help traders improve their knowledge and skills.

In addition to the educational materials brokers provide, some trading platforms also offer demo accounts where traders can practice trading with virtual money in a simulated trading environment. This situation allows beginners to gain practical experience executing trades, managing positions, and testing different trading strategies without risking real money.

Overall, the education section on a broker‚Äôs trading platform can be a valuable resource for beginner traders looking to enhance their understanding of forex trading and improve their trading performance. Traders must use these educational materials and resources to build a strong foundation in forex trading and increase their chances of success in the market.
Start Small

When starting in forex trading, you must start small and only risk money you can afford to lose. This technique will help you gain experience and confidence in your trading abilities without the pressure of losing significant amounts of money. Starting small when you are a beginning trader offers several benefits that can help you build a solid foundation and increase your chances of long-term success in forex trading.

Trading with a small account allows you to gain practical experience executing trades, managing positions, and testing different trading strategies. This hands-on experience is essential for beginner traders to learn how the forex market works, understand market dynamics, and develop their trading skills over time. It also helps you identify what works best for you and refine your trading approach as you gain more experience.

Trading can be a highly emotional experience, with fear, greed, and anxiety often influencing trading decisions. Starting small helps you manage these emotions and stay disciplined in your trading approach. With a smaller account size, you may feel less pressured to make risky or impulsive trading decisions, allowing you to stay focused on your trading plan and avoid emotional reactions that can lead to poor trading outcomes.

Starting small can help you build confidence in your trading abilities and a winning mindset. As you make successful trades and see your account grow gradually, you will gain confidence in your trading skills and decision-making abilities. This positive reinforcement can boost your self-assurance and motivate you to continue improving and growing as a trader.

Trading with a small account allows you to experiment with different trading strategies and risk levels without significant financial consequences. This technique will enable you to adapt to changing market conditions, test new approaches, and refine your trading plan. By starting small, you can identify what works best for you and tailor your trading approach to suit your individual goals and risk tolerance.
Choose the Right Broker:

Selecting the right forex broker is crucial to your success as a trader. Look for a well-regulated, transparent broker that offers competitive spreads and leverage. Choosing a broker that offers a user-friendly trading platform that suits your trading style is also essential.

The forex market is decentralized and operates 24 hours a day, which can make it susceptible to fraud and scams. A regulated broker is authorized by a financial regulatory authority to offer brokerage services, which provides an extra layer of security and ensures that the broker complies with strict regulations and standards. Beginners should choose a broker regulated by a reputable regulatory body to protect their funds and provide a safe trading environment.

Brokers offer varying trading conditions, such as spreads, leverage, and commissions. Beginning traders should look for a broker that offers competitive and transparent trading conditions to minimize trading costs and maximize potential profits. When choosing a broker, it‚Äôs essential to consider factors such as spread size, leverage options, account types, and trading platforms.

Reliable customer support is essential for beginners who have questions or issues while trading. A broker that offers responsive customer support through multiple channels, such as phone, email, and live chat, can assist and address concerns promptly. Good customer support can help beginners navigate the trading platform, resolve technical issues, and access educational resources.

The trading platform provided by the broker is the primary tool through which traders execute trades, analyze market data, and manage their positions. Beginners should choose a broker that offers a user-friendly and feature-rich trading platform that meets their trading needs. A well-designed trading platform can enhance the trading experience, facilitate efficient trade execution, and provide access to advanced trading tools and indicators.

Many brokers offer educational resources, such as trading guides, webinars, and tutorials, to help beginners improve their trading knowledge and skills. Choosing a broker with comprehensive educational materials can benefit new traders by offering valuable insights into market analysis, trading strategies, risk management, and other essential aspects of forex trading.

The reputation and reliability of a broker are important considerations for beginning traders. Researching and reading reviews from other traders can help assess a broker‚Äôs reputation and determine whether they are trustworthy and reliable. A reputable broker with a positive track record will likely provide beginners with a secure and fair trading environment.
Develop a Trading Plan

Before making any trades, developing a trading plan outlining your trading goals, risk tolerance, and strategies is crucial. A solid plan will help you stay focused and disciplined in trading decisions.

A trading plan helps beginners clarify their trading objectives and focus on achieving their goals in the forex market. By outlining specific trading goals, entry and exit criteria, risk tolerance levels, and trading strategies, a trading plan provides a clear direction for traders to follow. It keeps you on track with trading activities.

Consistency and discipline are critical traits for successful trading. A trading plan helps beginners establish rules and guidelines for trading activities. By adhering to the regulations outlined in the trading plan, traders can maintain consistency in their trading approach and avoid impulsive or emotional trading decisions that may lead to losses.

Effective risk management is a vital component of a trading plan. By defining risk parameters, such as stop-loss levels, position sizing, and risk-reward ratios, beginners can protect their trading capital and minimize potential losses. A trading plan helps traders manage risk effectively and maintain a balanced risk-reward profile in their trading decisions.

A trading plan allows beginners to develop and test different trading strategies to identify what works best. By outlining specific entry and exit criteria, trade setups, and risk management rules, traders can refine their trading strategies and optimize their trading performance over time. A trading plan serves as a valuable tool for strategy development and improvement.
Practice with a Demo Account

Most forex brokers offer demo accounts that allow you to practice trading with virtual money. This product is an excellent way for beginners to get a feel for the market and test different trading strategies without risking any real money.

Demo accounts simulate trading. Demo accounts create a risk-free real market trading environment, allowing individuals to experience the capital markets trading environment without risking real capital. Forex market without risking actual money.

One of the primary benefits of demo accounts is that they allow traders to practice trading without risking their capital. Since demo accounts use virtual money, traders can experiment with different trading approaches, learn from their mistakes, and refine their strategies without incurring financial losses. This situation provides a low-pressure environment for beginners to build confidence and skills before transitioning to live trading.
Keep Your Emotions in Check

Trading can be an emotional rollercoaster, with highs and lows that can cloud judgment. Staying disciplined and sticking to your trading plan, even when the market is moving against you, is essential. Don‚Äôt let fear or greed dictate your trading decisions.
Stay Informed

The forex market is constantly changing, with economic indicators, geopolitical events, and central bank decisions all impacting currency prices. As a beginner trader, staying informed about current market trends and news that could affect your trades is important. Follow reputable financial news sources and stay up-to-date on market analysis to make informed trading decisions.
The Bottom Line

In conclusion, forex trading can be a challenging but rewarding endeavor for beginners. Following these eight tips for beginning forex traders, you can start your trading journey on the right track and increase your chances of success in the dynamic and ever-changing forex market. Remember to educate yourself, start small, choose the right broker, develop a trading plan, practice with a demo account, manage your risk, keep your emotions in check, and stay informed. With dedication, discipline, and a willingness to learn, beginner forex traders can build a solid foundation for long-term trading success.

title: AI Predicts China Will Ban High-Energy Blockchains
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: AI Predicts China Will Ban High-Energy Blockchains
China, known for its significant share of the global cryptocurrency mining industry, has been grappling with the environmental ramifications of its burgeoning blockchain sector.
With concerns over carbon emissions and energy consumption on the rise, regulatory bodies are under pressure to address these issues.

In a bid to understand the future landscape of this burgeoning sector, we consulted three leading AI platforms‚ÄîChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Microsoft Copilot‚Äîto predict the fate of eco-friendly digital currencies, often termed ‚Äúgreen cryptocurrencies.‚Äù
Regulations on Big Crypto Energy
The focus on sustainability has prompted governments worldwide to scrutinize the environmental impact of cryptocurrencies.
Forthcoming regulations are expected to center on reducing the energy consumption of these technologies, with potential restrictions placed on high-energy blockchains.
Green cryptocurrencies are those that utilize blockchain technology to ensure a significantly reduced carbon footprint.
This is primarily achieved through the Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which requires far less energy than the traditional Proof of Work (PoW) system used by platforms like Bitcoin.
Examples of green cryptocurrencies include Cardano, Algorand, and Tezos, which promise a more sustainable approach to digital transactions and asset management.
Bitcoin Price Prediction
Bitcoin, the first and most famous cryptocurrency, faces increasing scrutiny due to its significant energy demands and consequent carbon emissions.
A single Bitcoin transaction consumes over 705 kWh of electricity, according to Digiconomist. This is enough to power an average U.S. household for about 60 days.

A single bitcoin transaction consumes more electricity than a US household in a month. A query on ChatGPT uses 10 times more electricity than a Google search. Moving all internet queries to AI will consume as much electricity as Ireland does in a year https://t.co/5pq6n1E9cZ
‚Äî Reveal IT Ireland (@RevealITIreland) April 4, 2024

While Bitcoin has shown resilience and adaptability, the increasing focus on green technologies might influence its price and the broader investor landscape, potentially driving a shift towards more sustainable alternatives.
China to Ban High-Energy Blockchains
On the global stage, the response to the crypto energy crisis varies. Countries like Sweden and Iceland have embraced green crypto mining thanks to their abundant renewable energy sources.

Conversely, China, once a powerhouse in the crypto mining world, is predicted to implement a ban on high-energy blockchains in a decisive move to curb the environmental degradation linked to these activities.
This looming ban could set a precedent, urging other nations to consider similar restrictions or to adopt more sustainable practices in the cryptocurrency mining industry.

The collective shift towards green crypto could redefine the economic and environmental landscape of digital finance, presenting a new paradigm where technology and sustainability are no longer at odds but are intertwined for global betterment.

title: Six Arrested in Connection with Austrian Crypto Fraud Scheme, ‚Ç¨2M Worth of Assets Frozen
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: Six Arrested in Connection with Austrian Crypto Fraud Scheme, ‚Ç¨2M Worth of Assets Frozen

A joint operation involving national authorities from Austria, Cyprus, and the Czech Republic has led to the arrest of six individuals connected to an online scam related to the sale of rights or tokens for a supposed new cryptocurrency.
Supported by Eurojust and Europol, the coordinated action resulted in the seizure and freezing of assets totaling ‚Ç¨2 million, according to an official announcement.
The operation included the execution of search warrants and the apprehension of the main suspects, the report said.
Scammers Posed as Legitimate Trading Company

The fraudulent scheme took place between December 2017 and February 2018, during which the scammers posed as operators of a legitimate online trading company that had allegedly launched a new cryptocurrency.
They offered 10 million tokens or rights to the new currency for sale, accepting payments in established cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum.
To gain credibility with investors, the fraudsters claimed to have developed their own software and algorithm for token sales.
However, in February 2018, the perpetrators abruptly closed all their social media accounts and took down the fake company‚Äôs website, executing what is commonly known as an exit scam.
This move exposed the fact that investors had been deceived, resulting in losses estimated at around ‚Ç¨6 million.
Not all victims of the fraud have been identified at this stage.

The report said that Eurojust played a crucial role in supporting the operation against the online scam by establishing a coordination center to facilitate real-time communication among the participating authorities.
This enabled the swift execution of European Arrest Warrants and search warrants.
Europol also contributed to the operation by deploying a mobile office in Cyprus and organizing operational meetings.
Additionally, they worked closely with the Austrian desk at Eurojust to provide a comprehensive analysis of the investigation.
Instagram Influencer ‚ÄòJay Mazini‚Äô Sentenced to 7 Years in Prison
In another incident, Instagram influencer Jebara Igbara, known as ‚ÄúJay Mazini,‚Äù has been sentenced to seven years in prison for orchestrating a multi-million dollar crypto Ponzi scheme.
JUST IN: Jebara Igbara, AKA 'Jay Mazini,' Sentenced to 7 Years in Prison for Crypto-Related Fraud pic.twitter.com/9r8dEvdq1J
‚Äî BitMemes Daily (@daily_bitmeme) April 25, 2024

Igbara, a 28-year-old from New Jersey, pleaded guilty to fraud charges, confessing to running a Ponzi scheme that involved cryptocurrency fraud and resulted in approximately $8 million in illicit gains.
The money was used to fund an extravagant lifestyle, including luxury cars and excessive gambling.
More recently, Queensland Police took action against an alleged crypto investment fraud operating on the Gold Coast, resulting in the arrest and charging of four individuals.
The investigation, led by the Financial and Cyber Crime Group Money Laundering Unit, began in July 2022.

The search focused on companies including Crypto Advisers Australia, Strategic Capital, Active Marketing Solutions, and Alternative Capital, which were suspected of engaging in fraud and money laundering activities.
As reported, the first quarter of this year has seen $336 million lost to Web3 hackers and fraud, with nearly half of the capital stolen in January alone.

title: Bitpanda Expands Partnership with Raiffeisen to 55 Additional Banks
author: Sead Fadilpa≈°iƒá

elements: Bitpanda Expands Partnership with Raiffeisen to 55 Additional Banks
Major European Investing-as-a-Service provider Bitpanda Technology Solutions has expanded its partnership with banking giant Raiffeisen.
Now, customers of the Raiffeisen banks in Burgenland and Lower Austria will be able to invest in cryptocurrencies and other digital assets via Bitpanda through the mobile banking app Mein ELBA.
This is in addition to customers of Raiffeisenlandesbank N√ñ-Wien in Vienna who have been able to utilize this offer.
Therefore, the partnership with Bitpanda Technology Solutions will be rolled out to an additional 55 Raiffeisen banks.
Through this existing banking app, customers in both Burgenland and Lower Austria now have ‚Äúsecure and easy access‚Äù to over 2,000 digital assets, said the press release today.

Today, Raiffeisenlandesbank Nieder√∂sterreich-Wien became the first major traditional European bank to offer direct investment in digital assets, made possible through the partnership with Bitpanda Technology Solutions.
Learn more about this historic partnership:‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/H3r19TwWl5
‚Äî Bitpanda (@Bitpanda_global) January 25, 2024
The partners offer the service specifically to users who want to invest ‚Äúdigitally and independently‚Äù in crypto, precious metals, and other asset classes via Mein ELBA.
‚ÄúThe user-friendly white-label integration from Bitpanda Technology Solutions enables ‚Äútrading for all‚Äù in the truest sense of the word,‚Äù Bitpanda says.
It provides a clear and comprehensible overview of all assets within the app.
Therefore, both new investors and experienced traders can benefit from the customized service.
New Milestones and Rise in Customer Demand
This latest news follows the success of the collaboration with RLB N√ñ-Wien, announced in January.

Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, CEO of Bitpanda Technology Solutions, stated that this partnership is ‚Äúa perfect example of what banks can achieve when they approach projects with ambition and an innovative perspective.‚Äù
Notably, since the joint launch with Raiffeisenlandesbank Nieder√∂sterreich-Vienna in January, Bitpanda recorded ‚Äúa significant increase in customer demand.‚Äù

Dank dieser Partnerschaft wird Bitpanda Tech die RLB N√ñ-Wien bei ihren kontinuierlichen Bem√ºhungen unterst√ºtzen, Wachstum und Innovation im Sinne der Kunden zu erm√∂glichen und sich als Vorreiter unter den traditionsreichen europ√§ischen Banken zu etablieren.
‚Äî Bitpanda (@Bitpanda) April 26, 2023
Now, with this latest expansion, ‚Äúa new milestone has been set,‚Äù commented Rudolf Suttner, CEO of RLB Burgenland.
‚ÄúWith the integration of Bitpanda into the Mein ELBA app, we are one of the first traditional banks in Europe to enable trading in digital assets,‚Äù he said.
The bank‚Äôs aim was to create ‚Äúabsolute customer centricity,‚Äù and this cooperation has enabled just that.
Their customers can ‚Äúinnovatively and independently‚Äù invest in crypto and other Bitpanda asset classes from anywhere, anytime, for as little as EUR 1.
By integrating Bitpanda into the app, ‚Äúwe have created an innovative investment solution that we hope will also inspire new customers,‚Äù Suttner said.
For Bitpanda, too, this partnership expansion is an important milestone, it said.
The company added that it has over four million users and is heavily regulated.

It holds a MiFID II investment firm license and an E-money license under PSD II. It also has several crypto licenses and registrations as a provider of virtual assets in Austria, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, and other countries.
Meanwhile, Bitpanda recently announced an operations expansion to the Middle East. It is opening a regional office in the United Arab Emirates.
Former 1inch Network‚Äôs business development and head of growth, Walid Benothman, will lead its operations in the region.

title: Crypto Scam Update: Stolen $71M WBTC Loot Distributed Among Multiple Wallets
author: Ruholamin Haqshanas

elements: Crypto Scam Update: Stolen $71M WBTC Loot Distributed Among Multiple Wallets
Stolen crypto funds tied to a recent $71 million wallet impersonation scam have started moving after six days.
On May 3, an investor fell victim to a wallet poisoning scam, sending $71 million worth of Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) to a bait wallet address.
The scammer created a wallet address with similar alphanumeric characters, tricking the victim into transferring 97% of their assets.

Typically, investors validate wallet addresses by matching the first and last few characters, but fail to notice discrepancies in the middle characters that are often hidden on platforms for visual appeal.
In this case, the difference would have been noticeable if carefully examined.
Hacker Converts Stolen WBTC to ETH
The hacker behind the scam swiftly converted the stolen WBTC into approximately 23,000 ETH, a common tactic used to make siphoning easier through privacy protocols like Tornado Cash.
The converted funds remained dormant in the scammer‚Äôs wallet for six days.
On May 8, blockchain investigation firm PeckShield observed the movements of the stolen funds.
The scammer began splitting the loot into multiple parts and distributing them across several crypto wallets.

#PeckShieldAlert #Layering The scammer who grabbed ~$71 million worth of $WBTC via a poisoning #scam has laundered the stolen funds (~23K $ETH) by sending and spreading them across a large number of wallets. https://t.co/Blnw5TMT99 pic.twitter.com/CATCb6t1LL
‚Äî PeckShieldAlert (@PeckShieldAlert) May 8, 2024
To reduce traceability, around 400 wallets were used, ultimately leading to over 150 wallets holding the stolen funds.
However, at the time of writing, the stolen funds can still be traced back to the unknown scammer
Throughout history, crypto scammers and hackers have been particularly active during bullish market conditions.
It is crucial for investors to educate themselves on secure cryptocurrency storage practices. Cointelegraph provides a learners‚Äô guide on how to safely store cryptocurrencies.
In another type of scam, bad actors have devised a technique to drain users‚Äô wallets without requiring transaction approval.
This particular scam targets tokens that adhere to the ERC-2612 token standard, allowing for ‚Äúgas-less‚Äù transfers or transfers without the need for holding ETH in the wallet.
However, to enable approval-less transactions, users must be deceived into signing a message.
A recent investigation uncovered a Telegram group featuring a fake version of the Collab.Land Telegram verification system, which orchestrated this scam.
April Records Lowest Crypto Hack Losses
The cryptocurrency industry experienced a major downturn in combined losses from hacks and scams in April.
The month saw the lowest combined losses from crypto-related hacks and scams since 2021, with approximately $25.7 million lost to exploits, hacks, and scams.
More specifically, only $25.7 million was lost in attacks throughout the month, marking the lowest amount since CertiK began tracking such data in 2021.
Flash loan attacks accounted for $129,000 in losses, with the largest incident causing $55,000 in damages.
This marked the lowest incidence of flash loan attacks since February 2022, and $4.3 million was lost to exit scams.
As reported, the first quarter of this year has seen $336 million lost to Web3 hackers and fraud, with nearly half of the capital stolen in January alone.
Nonetheless, the number represents a 23% decrease compared to the first quarter of 2023.
It is also worth noting that $73,885,000 has been recovered from stolen Web3 capital in 7 specific situations.

title: Pushd‚Äôs Innovative E-Commerce Model Draws Monero & Zcash for Potential 100X Returns

elements: Pushd‚Äôs Innovative E-Commerce Model Draws Monero & Zcash for Potential 100X Returns

Pushd‚Äôs presale is drawing attention from privacy-centric communities like Monero and Zcash, intrigued by its innovative e-commerce model. With promises of potential 100X returns, these investors are particularly interested in Pushd‚Äôs approach to blending e-commerce with advanced security and anonymity features, proposing a compelling growth trajectory in the burgeoning sector of blockchain-based retail solutions.
Monero Enhances Privacy in Transactions

Monero is widely recognized for its privacy features, offering users anonymity that is rarely available in other cryptocurrencies. Its continuous updates focus on strengthening its privacy protections without compromising on scalability, making it a favored choice for users prioritizing confidentiality in their transactions.

Monero uses ring signatures to provide privacy. This technology mixes a user‚Äôs account keys with public keys from Monero‚Äôs blockchain to create a ‚Äòring‚Äô of signers, making it extremely difficult to identify the actual signer of a transaction. To enhance privacy further, the platform generates random one-time addresses for each transaction on behalf of the recipient. This ensures that transactions are not linked to a common owner or a permanent address on the blockchain.

Introduced in late 2018, Bulletproofs are a type of non-interactive zero-knowledge proof that reduces the size of transactions and, consequently, the fees associated with them. This was a significant improvement that helped make Monero transactions more efficient while maintaining privacy.
Zcash Offers Strong Encryption

Zcash provides strong encryption to secure the details of transactions while still allowing them to be verified under the network‚Äôs consensus rules through its innovative zero-knowledge proof construction. Recent developments in Zcash aim to enhance this feature further, making it even more robust against potential security threats.

Zcash offers the option of ‚Äúshielded‚Äù transactions, which allow for the encryption of transaction information. These transactions use zero-knowledge proofs to validate transactions without revealing information about the sender, receiver or transaction amount. With Zcash, users have the option to disclose transaction details for auditing or compliance purposes. This selective transparency ensures that users can comply with regulatory requirements without compromising overall privacy.
Pushd Leverages Cryptocurrency for E-Commerce Growth

Monero and Zcash enthusiasts are drawn to Pushd‚Äôs innovative e-commerce model, which promises potential 100X returns and is currently priced at just $0.144 in the sixth stage of the presale. Pushd plans to integrate the privacy and security features of Monero and Zcash to protect consumer data and transaction details, creating a trustworthy environment for online shoppers and sellers. This focus on privacy and security in an e-commerce context positions Pushd as a pioneering platform, poised for significant growth in the expanding digital market landscape.

Pushd‚Äôs comprehensive approach to market stability, featuring a 20-year liquidity lock and a 700-day team token lock, sets a new standard in the cryptocurrency market. These measures ensure that the platform can withstand the test of time and market fluctuations, providing a reliable and secure environment for users and investors alike. This strategic foresight underscores Pushd‚Äòs potential as a leading investment in the burgeoning field of decentralized marketplaces. Pushd is a project that experts are terming as future blue-chip cryptocurrency, so missing out on early investing in this platform would be a huge miss.

title: Hackers Expose Code Of El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin Wallet App Chivo
author: Andrew Throuvalas

elements: Hackers Expose Code Of El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin Wallet App Chivo
Hackers exposed more information about El Salvador‚Äôs state-run Bitcoin wallet, Chivo, on April 23 after publicly leaking the personal data of its millions of users earlier this month.
Hacker group CiberInteligenciaSV released part of the software wallet‚Äôs source code on BreachForums ‚Äì a black hat hacking forum.
El Salvador Hackers Strike Again

‚ÄúThis time I bring you the code that is inside the Bitcoin Chivo Wallet ATMs in El Salvador, remember that it is a government wallet, and as you know, we do not sell, we publish everything for free for you,‚Äù wrote the hacker group.
Cybersecurity project VenariX warned of an incoming Chivo source code data leak on Monday, citing a post from the hacker group‚Äôs Telegram channel.

El grupo #hacker #CiberInteligenciaElSalvador, anuncia en su cuenta de Telegram que publicar√° parte del c√≥digo fuente y accesos VPN de #Chivo #Wallet (@chivowallet), la billetera oficial de #Bitcoin y #D√≥lar creada por el #Gobierno de #ElSalvador üá∏üáª (@Gobierno_SV)‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/AUG8PM1VN8
‚Äî VenariX en Espa√±ol (@_venarixES_) April 22, 2024

‚ÄúTonight we will publish part of the source code and VPN access that belongs to Chivo Wallet, for free as always, unless one of you nosy government people wants to talk,‚Äù CiberInteligenciaSV‚Äôs Telegram post stated.

The same group released over 144 GB of data containing the personal information of 5.1 million Salvadorans who had downloaded the wallet. Though available for purchase through different channels since August, it was only leaked for download starting April 5.
The stolen information included each user‚Äôs full name, unique identifying number, date of birth, address, and an HD picture of their face.
This week‚Äôs leaked information also included the file Codigo.rar, which included code and VPN credentials on ElSalvador‚Äôs Chivo ATM network.
The nation‚Äôs government is yet to release an official statement regarding either of this month‚Äôs hacks.
El Salvador‚Äôs Wallet Rollout

El Salvador initially released Chivo in September 2021, alongside its official implementation of Bitcoin (BTC) as legal tender. The law meant that Bitcoin could be used as official currency ‚Äì including for tax payments ‚Äì alongside the US dollar, without realizing a capital gains tax when that Bitcoin is sold or traded.

Chivo‚Äôs rollout began with a rocky start as users reported many software bugs and technical glitches afflicting the software. Some failed to receive a free $30 for downloading the wallet that the President promised them, while others had trouble withdrawing their money from Chivo ATMs.

Late last year, the Salvadoran government revealed that it was installing lightning network technology at over 100 Chivo ATMs across the country, to be installed in Q4 2024. The technology can theoretically allow Salvadorans to cash in and out of Bitcoin faster and with lower fees.
A Salvadoran newspaper reported in October that less than 2% of the population was actually using the wallet for remittance payments, which was supposed to be one of its primary selling points.

Jupiter is currently one of the most popular decentralized applications on the Solana blockchain, with $381.49 million in total value locked (TVL), having grown 86% month over month. title: Samsung Subsidiary Invests in DePIN Firm Roam
author: Tim Alper

elements: Samsung Subsidiary Invests in DePIN Firm Roam
The Samsung subsidiary Samsung Next, an affiliate of Samsung Electronics, has made an undisclosed investment in the DePIN player Roam.
Per the South Korean media outlet Global Economic, the money will help Roam build a network of global WiFi roaming nodes.
The firm, operated by MetaBlox, is also building a DeWi (decentralized WiFi) ecosystem.
#Roam X @SamsungNext ü§ù
As the latest investment unfolds, Samsung Next's support for Roam promises a bright future ahead.
Here‚Äôs what you want to know about this investment üëá pic.twitter.com/Fu7SmL5fFJ
‚Äî Roam by MetaBlox (@metablox) April 22, 2024
Samsung Subsidiary Makes Second Roam Investment
Samsung Next is a Samsung Electronics venture capital arm. It focuses on investment in sectors including AI, the Internet-of-Things, crypto, and blockchain.
The firm has a presence in the United States, and has previously invested in overseas crypto projects ‚Äì including FTX.
Late last year, Samsung Next joined a Roam strategic financing round that raised $5 million. Neither party disclosed the size of the Samsung affiliate‚Äôs latest cash injection.
Samsung Next has previously backed crypto and blockchain startups. Its previous moves include a 2021 investment in Sky Mavis, the Vietnam-based firm behind the blockchain gaming title Axie Infinity.
The South Korea-based firm has also backed the web3 developer platform Alchemy, as well as the now-defunct NFT player Nifty‚Äôs.

Today, we're announcing our $11 million in Series A funding from investors like @streamlinedvc , @ycombinator, @SamsungNext , @alumniventures, and @DispersionVC . But for us, it's not just a milestone. pic.twitter.com/dihGk3FC8F
‚Äî Davit (@DBuniatyan) March 26, 2024
Roam said that Samsung Next ‚Äúhas shown a deep commitment to fostering blockchain innovation.‚Äù
The DePIN player said the fact that it had received Samsung Next backing proved ‚Äúa distinct preference for Roam‚Äôs potential and innovation.‚Äù
What Is DePIN?
DePIN, short for Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks, refers to projects that develop blockchain-powered management systems for real-world ‚Äúphysical infrastructure.‚Äù
This can include computing power, WiFi networks, and data marketplaces. Projects typically use decentralized applications that use digital coins to incentivize service providers.

On X (formerly Twitter), Roam wrote that the investment would ‚Äúcontribute to enhancing Roam‚Äù by ‚Äúintegrating the latest technologies and protocols, and expanding its user base to traditional Web2 and Web3 users.‚Äù The company added:
‚ÄúWith Samsung Next‚Äôs backing, Roam is poised to accomplish its mission of bringing decentralized internet access to users worldwide ‚Äì making it more user-centric, secure, and transparent.‚Äù
Other Roam backers include the likes of crypto and blockchain investors Volt Capital and Comma3 Ventures.

title: Canaan Executives Plan to Buy $2 Million in Company Shares, Citing Deep Undervaluation
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: Canaan Executives Plan to Buy $2 Million in Company Shares, Citing Deep Undervaluation

Two executives of the bitcoin mining rig maker Canaan intend to jointly purchase at least $2 million worth of company shares, claiming the company is ‚Äúdeeply undervalued,‚Äù despite revenue decline.
According to its annual report released last week, Canaan‚Äôs total revenues shrank by 67.5% to $211.5 million in 2023 from $651.5 million in 2022.
Canaan Inc. Executives Express Confidence Through Personal Investment

Canaan, a prominent provider of high-performance computing solutions, has disclosed that its Chairman and CEO, Nangeng Zhang, along with Chief Financial Officer, James Jin Cheng, have expressed their intent to utilize personal funds for a joint purchase of at least USD $2 million worth of the company‚Äôs Class A ordinary shares, represented by American depositary shares (‚ÄúADSs‚Äù).
The initiative is subject to the company‚Äôs insider trading policy and complies with legal guidelines.
‚ÄúWe believe that the company is deeply undervalued, providing a rare investment opportunity for us to pursue,‚Äù Zhang commented.

Zhang further elaborated that Canaan is progressing well in manufacturing its A14 series mining rigs, fulfilling previous contract sales orders, including bulk orders from public company customers. He elaborated on the progress made in streamlining the manufacturing of A14 series mining machines, advancements in the development of next-generation A15 series units, and ongoing R&D of the A16 series.
Their decision follows the recent fourth halving event on the Bitcoin network, in which Zhang emphasized its potential for emerging opportunities in the Bitcoin ecosystem.
‚ÄúNow that the fourth bitcoin halving occurred on Friday, we expect many more opportunities will emerge in the ecosystem,‚Äù Zhang added.
Established in 2013, Canaan is a technology company specializing in ASIC high-performance computing chip design, chip research and development, computing equipment production, and software services.

Under the leadership of Nangeng Zhang, the company‚Äôs founding team achieved a significant milestone by shipping the world‚Äôs first batch of mining machines incorporating ASIC technology in Bitcoin‚Äôs history under the brand name Avalon. In 2019, Canaan completed its initial public offering on the Nasdaq Global Market.
Bitcoin ASIC Manufacturer Canaan Reports Decline in Revenue Despite Bull Market

üìâ Canaan ‚Äì a China-based Bitcoin ASIC manufacturer and operator ‚Äì lost nearly half its revenue from mining machine sales last quarter, according to its Q3 earnings.#CryptoNews #BTChttps://t.co/yB1LNS4Ceu
‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) November 28, 2023
Despite the ongoing bull market in the cryptocurrency space, demand for Bitcoin application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) miners and servers has remained subdued.

On February 27, Bitcoin ASIC manufacturer Canaan released its earnings report for the fourth quarter of 2023. The company disclosed revenue of $49 million, marking a 16% decrease compared to the same period the previous year.

Additionally, Canaan reported a widening net loss of $139 million, compared to $91.6 million in the fourth quarter of 2022. Despite an uptick in the amount of computing power sold and a recovery in Bitcoin‚Äôs price to $66,089, Canaan attributed the revenue decline to selling its ASICs at lower prices relative to the market throughout last year.

Also, Canaan‚Äôs annual report for the year 2023 revealed a net loss of $414.2 million, compared to a net income of $69.9 million in 2022. Total revenues, including product and mining revenue, declined significantly by 67.5% to $211.5 million in 2023 from $651.5 million in 2022.

The revenue decline was attributed to a decrease in the average selling price of Canaan‚Äôs Bitcoin mining machines on a per-Thash basis, dropping from US$40.8 per Thash in 2022 to US$8.9 per Thash in 2023. This decrease resulted from soft demand and a price drop in computing power throughout 2023.
Despite the revenue decline, mining revenue amounted to $34 million in 2023, slightly higher than the $32.5 million recorded in 2022, according to the company‚Äôs report.

title: ZachXBT Exposes 12 Abandoned Solana Presale Meme Coin Projects Resulting in $26.7 Million in Losses
author: Hassan Shittu

elements: ZachXBT Exposes 12 Abandoned Solana Presale Meme Coin Projects Resulting in $26.7 Million in Losses

In a recent report, crypto investigator ZachXBT uncovered that nearly 12 Solana presale meme coins have been ‚Äúcompletely abandoned‚Äù within the past month, collectively raising 180,650 SOL, equivalent to approximately $26.7 million.
Despite the major fundraising, many of these meme coin projects have experienced sharp declines in value post-launch, with one project failing to launch a token.
Solana Meme Coin Projects Experience Significant Declines After Controversial Presales
I was interested to see how much SOL has been sent as a result of the presale meta and calculated >655,000 SOL ($122.5M) raised from 27 presales. pic.twitter.com/dvsW4TSoov
‚Äî ZachXBT (@zachxbt) March 19, 2024

According to a post dated March 19, ZachXBT shared insights on 27 meme coin presales on Solana since March 12. The total funds raised during these presales were estimated to be 655,000 SOL, equivalent to $122.5 million then.
Only 1 month has passed and 12 of the Solana presale meme coins have been completely abandoned after raising >180,650 SOL ($26.7M).
Would avoid any future projects launched by these founders. https://t.co/J0zFldRIa6 pic.twitter.com/K610MAEPMn
‚Äî ZachXBT (@zachxbt) April 21, 2024

However, in an X post dated April 21, ZachXBT highlighted 12 Solana meme coin projects that utilized the controversial presale method, with many experiencing large declines in value since their launch. Notably, one project appears to have not launched any token at all.

The most costly of these abandoned presale projects was a meme coin named ‚ÄúI like this coin,‚Äù with the ticker LIKE. Its pseudonymous founder, pokeee.eth, raised 52,220 SOL tokens (equivalent to $7.7 million at current prices) for the meme coin, launching it on March 17 with a market capitalization of $577 million.

However, LIKE‚Äôs value plummeted rapidly, dropping over 90% in the first eight hours since launch. As of the latest update, LIKE has seen a 99.2% decrease from its initial price, and activity from its official X account and its founder, pokeee.eth, has ceased since March 31.

The second-largest abandoned presale reportedly belongs to a Solana meme coin with the ticker MOONKE. Launched by the X user @RockyXBT on March 20, it raised 37,470 SOL for the MOONKE token, with an initial market cap of nearly $500 million, which similarly plummeted by nearly 100%.

Another notable instance is the FROG token by X user @Pepecasso1, which was abandoned after raising 29,761 SOL tokens. Additionally, X user @Jared_eth, who raised 4,567 SOL tokens, failed to launch a token.
Blockaid Study Reveals Concerning Trends in Solana Presale Tokens

A recent study by cybersecurity firm Blockaid unveiled findings regarding presale tokens launched on the Solana blockchain between November 2023 and February 2024. According to the study, 50% of these presale tokens were identified as malicious.

Ido Ben-Natan, the co-founder of Blockaid, pointed out that this surge in scammer activity coincides with the rise in the adoption of presale tokens during February and March, driven by the popularity of legitimate meme coins. Ben-Natan emphasized how scammers exploit users‚Äô fear of missing out (FOMO) during heightened interest in these tokens.
The study specifically highlighted individuals like Jared_eth and Bluekirbyftm, also mentioned by ZachXBT in a recent post, as being involved in scam activities.

One notable incident involving a Solana presale token occurred in March, where the developer of a meme coin named Slerf claimed to have mistakenly burned the entire presale allocation due to a ‚Äúfat finger‚Äù burn error.

Recent weeks have witnessed a decline in market enthusiasm for meme coins, with several Solana-based tokens, including dogwifhat (WIF), experiencing declines of over 40%. This downturn in market sentiment may reflect growing caution among investors following the proliferation of scam tokens and fraudulent activities within the ecosystem.

Similarly, another popular meme coin on Solana, BOOK OF MEME (BOME), fell by 2.3% over the same period. However, leading Solana-based meme coins like BONK and MEW have witnessed substantial surges over the past week, with BONK growing by over 33% and MEW surging by more than 15% in the last 7 days.

title: Pharrell Williams And Louis Vuitton Launch NFT-Linked Jacket To VIA Holders
author: Julia Smith

elements: Pharrell Williams And Louis Vuitton Launch NFT-Linked Jacket To VIA Holders

Renowned fashion house Louis Vuitton and record producer Pharrell Williams are delving further into Web3 fashion with their new VIA NFT-linked varsity jacket, according to reports on Tuesday. Their latest design was released to the company‚Äôs VIA NFT holders.

The physical western-inspired varsity jacket, made of suede buckskin and featuring the brand‚Äôs logo emblazoned across the front, debuted at Louis Vuitton‚Äôs Autumn/Winter 2024 men‚Äôs runway show in Paris this past January.
Louis Vuitton Launches ‚ÄúPhygital‚Äù Varsity Jacket To VIA Holders

Holders of the luxury company‚Äôs VIA NFT project who purchase the jacket (going for an estimated $8,450) will also gain its digital twin in the form of a collectible NFT, of which only 200 pieces are available.
The piece‚Äôs market release plays on the concept of the new concept of ‚Äúphygital‚Äù goods‚Äîwhen both digital and physical copies of a product are made and sold.
The physical varsity jacket is expected to be shipped to purchasers by November or December of this year, while its digital copy will be available immediately for purchase.
Pharrell Williams Embraces The World Of Web3
The latest digital launch from Louis Vuitton marks the French fashion house‚Äôs continued efforts to capitalize on Web3 fashion, particularly regarding exclusive NFT-based experiences.

In June 2023, the luxury brand unveiled its application-only VIA project last year, with customers able to purchase its first Web3 creation in the form of a $41,000 digitized version of its iconic LV trunk aptly named ‚ÄúThe Treasure Trunk.‚Äù
According to a statement from Louis Vuitton at the time, the trunk was ‚Äúdesigned for those who seek to travel through new dreams and new realities, and collect unique creations along the way.‚Äù

The project marks the second NFT-related product Williams has launched with the brand following his debut last June, featuring the company‚Äôs orange monogram Speedy 40 bag, which sold for just over $9,000.

Louis Vuitton VIA. The first VIA journey is now available. Discover the Speedy 40 VIA @Pharrell, revisiting the Maison's iconic bag crafted in 1930. Discover more at https://t.co/FN7LgduFzK#LouisVuittonVIA #PharrellWilliams pic.twitter.com/X2i5G7w9xQ
‚Äî Louis Vuitton (@LouisVuitton) July 17, 2023
Additionally, Louis Vuitton‚Äôs women‚Äôs creative director, Nicolas Ghesqui√®re, launched a $6,400 mini trunk for the brand late last year.
Web3 Fashion‚Äôs Growth

As the metaverse continues to expand, the Web3 fashion industry is expected to see a boom in business within the next decade. By 2031, it‚Äôs expected to reach $4.8 billion and see a compound annual growth rate of over 26%.
Louis Vuitton has long stayed ahead of the curve of emerging tech in the fashion world, most recently launching a Discord server related to its upcoming endeavors.
The luxury brand‚Äôs decision to continue leading the Web3 fashion universe could lay the foundation of what luxury style may look like in the future.

title: Nvidia Partners with Vietnamese IT Firm FPT to Construct $200M AI Factory
author: Jimmy Aki

elements: Nvidia Partners with Vietnamese IT Firm FPT to Construct $200M AI Factory

US chipmaker Nvidia has partnered with Vietnamese IT company FPT to set up a $200 million artificial intelligence (AI) factory in Vietnam. The collaboration, announced on April 23, will lead to the creation of a hub for AI and cloud computing services in the Asian country.

The joint press release stated that FPT and the Nvidia AI factory will serve as a ‚Äúsovereign cloud‚Äù that will focus on AI research and development using Nvidia‚Äôs latest technologies. These include Nvidia AI Enterprise software and frameworks and Nvidia H100 Tensor Core GPUs.
FPT and Nvidia AI Factory Pledge to Scale Vietnam‚Äôs AI Industry

The Nvidia AI factory will provide cloud GPU services to FPT‚Äôs corporate customers globally and grant them access to core resources designed to improve research capacity, scale AI applications, and achieve productivity and customer experience milestones.
Great news! FPT Corporation and @nvidia today entered a comprehensive strategic partnership to harness the power of #AI across sectors. Read more: https://t.co/LFncYkP9w8 pic.twitter.com/Mb2hxF5kx2
‚Äî FPT Software (@fpt_software) April 23, 2024
The goal of the partnership is to position Vietnam as an ‚ÄúAI hub of the world‚Äù while also speeding up the adoption of AI applications in neighboring countries like Japan and South Korea.

As part of the collaboration, FPT has joined the ‚ÄúNVIDIA Partner Network‚Äù as a Service Delivery Partner to become a Global Systems Integrator. This will allow the IT firm to leverage Nvidia‚Äôs advanced products and technologies to develop tailored cloud services, hardware, software, and, notably, generative AI solutions.
During the signing ceremony, Dr. Truong Gia Binh, FPT Corporation Chairman and Founder, expressed excitement about the partnership.

‚ÄúFPT is committed to Digital transformation, AI, Cloud, and Education,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúFPT strives to enhance our R&D competence and establish a comprehensive platform for state-of-the-art products and services built on AI and Cloud that exceeds global demands, working to achieve its vision to turn Vietnam into an AI hub of the world through collaboration with NVIDIA in technology, business development, and training.‚Äù

Nvidia Vice President of Worldwide AI Initiative Keith Strier commented on AI‚Äôs potential to improve lives and strengthen economies across various sectors, including healthcare, agriculture, climate, and manufacturing.
He noted that the FPT and Nvidia partnership will empower organizations across Vietnam to drive transformation and help the country become a leader in AI technology.
AI Industry Secures Attract More Investments From Big Tech Firms
FPT and Nvidia‚Äôs AI partnership follows other Big tech firms‚Äô multi-billion-dollar investments in the AI industry worldwide.

For example, on April 16, software giant Microsoft invested $1.5 billion into G42, an AI-based company in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). The collaboration allows G42 to utilize Microsoft‚Äôs Azure cloud computing platform to power its AI services and applications, which will improve the safety and security of its infrastructure.

.@Microsoft's investment in @G42ai will enhance the UAE‚Äôs position as a leading #AI hub and provide digital infrastructure and services to help underserved nations innovate and grow. We will combine world-class technology with world-leading standards for safe, trusted, and‚Ä¶
‚Äî Brad Smith (@BradSmi) April 16, 2024

Microsoft also invested 3.2 billion euros ($3.44 billion) recently to boost AI industry infrastructure in Germany for the next two years, which was followed by a $2.1 billion pledge in AI infrastructure developments in Spain to improve ‚Äúlocal capacity for the technology.‚Äù
Meanwhile, Amazon has invested $4 billion into ChatGPT‚Äôs rival AI startup, Anthropic.
According to recent Statista data, the AI sector is projected to be worth $184 billion before the end of 2024 and $826 billion by 2030.

These projections, alongside the success of OpenAI‚Äôs GPT models, continue to drive many investments from Microsoft and other tech firms as they battle to become industry-leading AI innovation (and income) hubs.

title: The IMF Is ‚ÄúWaking Up‚Äù To Bitcoin, Says Bitwise CIO
author: Andrew Throuvalas

elements: The IMF Is ‚ÄúWaking Up‚Äù To Bitcoin, Says Bitwise CIO
The International Monetary Fund (IMF) is warming up to Bitcoin‚Äôs merits after years of criticizing and discouraging the use of crypto at large, according to crypto fund manager Bitwise.

In a Twitter thread published on Monday, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan dug into a 43-page paper published by three IMF researchers on April 5, which examined academic literature to assess Bitcoin as a medium of cross-border value transfer.
IMF On Bitcoin Remittance Payments

The paper presented on-chain and off-chain measures of international Bitcoin flows and found that such flows respond differently to traditional drivers. Specifically, the magnitude of cross-border Bitcoin transfers appears high in several countries with respect to their GDP ‚Äì especially ones that typically experience small capital flows.
‚ÄúIt makes sense,‚Äù Hougan wrote. ‚ÄúPeople in countries facing either capital controls or limited access to the global economy are using Bitcoin as a release valve.‚Äù
Takeaway #1: Countries that have limited access to the broader global economy are big users of bitcoin on a relative basis.
The paper notes: ‚ÄúThe magnitudes of the estimated Bitcoin cross-border flows are sizeable with respect to several countries‚Äô GDP, especially in those‚Ä¶
‚Äî Matt Hougan (@Matt_Hougan) April 22, 2024

The executive highlighted that the United States‚Äô relatively low adoption of Bitcoin as a tool for capital flows does not capture the reality of its use across the globe ‚Äì and is, in fact, an extreme outlier compared to other countries.
For example, Chainalysis data shows that cross-border on-chain Bitcoin flows in Venezuela averaged 0.8% of GDP between 2019 and 2022, versus less than 0.1% of GDP in Canada or the USA.
On-Chain VS Off Chain Flows

In general, on-chain cross-border flows align with crypto-specific sentiment, including a negative correlation with broad dollar appreciation events, and a positive correlation with the VIX ‚Äì a measure of implied stock market volatility.

In contrast, off-chain Bitcoin flows ‚Äúseem correlated with incentives to avoid capital flow restrictions‚Äù ‚Äì and are typically much smaller than on-chain transactions. Meanwhile, off-chain and on-chain flows both positively correlate with high inflation rates in a given country.
By Hougan‚Äôs assessment, the IMF‚Äôs paper is a sign that they are ‚Äúpaying attention‚Äù to Bitcoin in a way that they once neglected to.

‚ÄúThe IMF is doing this research because bitcoin ‚Äúhas grown rapidly over the past decade‚Äù and policymakers increasingly need to understand its impact on the global economy,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúThe world is waking up to bitcoin.‚Äù

Over the past several years, the IMF has criticized El Salvador‚Äôs adoption of Bitcoin as legal tender and urged the country to revoke its Bitcoin Law. In October, the IMF proposed a risk assessment matrix for countries to mitigate the negative macro-financial impact of crypto on their economies.

title: PayPal Proposes Incentive Program for Bitcoin Miners Utilizing Low-Carbon Energy
author: Jimmy Aki

elements: PayPal Proposes Incentive Program for Bitcoin Miners Utilizing Low-Carbon Energy
PayPal unveiled a new program to encourage low-carbon Bitcoin mining on April 22. The payment giant plans to reward cryptocurrency miners using sustainable energy with Bitcoin.

The proposed eco-friendly initiative for Bitcoin miners is a collaboration between PayPal‚Äôs Blockchain Research Group (BRG), Energy Web, and DMG Blockchain Solutions, a publicly traded blockchain company.
Can New Initiative Motivate PayPal Bitcoin Miners?

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that @energywebx and Green Proofs for Bitcoin #GP4BTC are collaborating with @Paypal on the Green Mining Initiative‚Äîan innovative approach to support Bitcoin‚Äôs decarbonization by financially rewarding miners who use clean energyüü£‚ö°Ô∏è
More information‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/qvziZPq1GY
‚Äî Energy Web (@energywebx) April 22, 2024

According to PayPal‚Äôs announcement, the new drive will use Energy Web‚Äôs ‚ÄúGreen Proofs for Bitcoin‚Äù platform. The network will certify PayPal Bitcoin miners based on their clean energy usage and grid impact scores. Green miners can register and share their green keys on the platform to participate in the incentive program.
The concept revolves around ‚Äúgreen miners‚Äù verifying transactions routed to them via the platform in exchange for BTC rewards.

Bitcoin mining is the process of verifying transactions on the blockchain in exchange for incentives in the form of newly minted Bitcoin. The process is a power-heavy activity that has been criticized in the past for its impact on the environment.

Consequently, the firms hope this experimental incentive will motivate Bitcoin miners to use clean energy and deepen discussion and innovation in the Bitcoin community. PayPal is also seeking industry feedback for potential improvements.

The PayPal Miners program is a response to the rising concerns about the environmental impact of Bitcoin mining, as the operation reportedly generates approximately 85 million metric tons of carbon dioxide equivalent emissions yearly.

The mining operation has been a topic of discussion within government and regulatory circles as they move to reduce its environmental impact. Recall that US Joe Biden had proposed an electricity tax for crypto mining, and Arkansas passed bills for crypto mining restrictions.
PayPal Disclose Initial Experiment Result of Proposed Sustainable Energy Sources

The payment platform published a research paper that detailed that PayPal‚Äôs BRG conducted successful tests of the eco-friendly Bitcoin miners initiative with DMG Blockchain Solutions Inc., which broadcasted various low-fee transactions to observe its efficiency across different levels of on-chain transaction volume.

‚ÄúOur expectation was that, depending on transaction volume, these transactions would either take a long time to confirm or eventually be dropped by the network,‚Äù the company stated. ‚ÄúThis would increase the chances for green miners to pick up these transactions.‚Äù
Energy Web championing a cleaner, greener future with every transaction!
‚Äî Oyeyemi Samuel (@Sammyoyey) April 22, 2024

Following the Bitcoin Halving 2024 event last week, which reduced miners‚Äô Bitcoin block reward of 6.25 BTC to 3.125 BTC, PayPal‚Äôs proposal would provide an additional source of revenue for Bitcoin miners who use low-carbon energy sources.
Meanwhile, Matteo Greco, research analyst at Fineqia International, had earlier stated that the Bitcoin halving could drive a greener Bitcoin mining network with more sustainable energy sources.

The research noted that reducing miners‚Äô rewards, paired with a continually increasing Bitcoin hash rate, would affect the profitability of mining firms, which could lead miners to search for greater capital efficiency via sustainable energy sources.
Greco‚Äôs insight came after the January 2024 Bitcoin ESG Forecast data, which revealed that 54.5% of the Bitcoin network‚Äôs energy consumption was powered by renewable energy resources at the time.
Nevertheless, PayPal‚Äôs research paper detailed plans to drive platforms to direct on-chain transactions to eco-friendly miners, promoting a greener approach to Bitcoin mining.

title: Do Kwon And Terraform Labs Hit With $5.3 Billion Penalty From SEC in Terra-Luna Case
author: Julia Smith

elements: Do Kwon And Terraform Labs Hit With $5.3 Billion Penalty From SEC in Terra-Luna Case

Terraform Labs and its founder, Do Kwon, are facing hefty financial trouble after the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filed a motion on April 19. The SEC is demanding $5.3 billion in fines following the commission‚Äôs win in its civil Terra-Luna case against the crypto mogul.
Terraform Labs And Founder Facing Billions In Penalties

The SEC‚Äôs filing in the U.S. District for the Southern District of New York seeks to make Kwon and Terraform Labs pay nearly $4.7 billion in disgorgement and prejudgment interest following the Terra-Luna case.
Kwon will also have to forfeit $100 million of his own funds in civil penalties, while Terraform Labs will have to pay $420 million, respectively.
#SEC seeks $5.3 billion against TerraformLabs & DoKwon after fraud verdict:
‚Äì Jury finds Terraform & Kwon liable for deceptive practices.
‚Äì SEC requests $4.7B in disgorgement and interest, plus $520M in civil penalties. ‚Äì In response, Terraform proposes a $3.5M penalty, Kwon‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/ZDw8w7Vw3C
‚Äî @TheLordofEntry (@thelordofentry) April 23, 2024

On top of financial fees, the SEC has asked the court to bar Kwon from operating as a securities officer and director of any securities issuer, as well as to issue an injunction against both the crypto founder and Terraform Labs.
The Landmark Civil Terra-Luna Case Against Do Kwon

New‚Äôs of the SEC‚Äôs motion follows a substantial two-week long trial that found Kwon liable for fraud after the collapse of his algorithmic stablecoin, TerraUSD, and its sister token, Luna, prompted a $40 billion crypto market crash.

Kwon was not present at the landmark civil trial, however. Instead, he was stuck in Montenegro after the country confiscated his passport following his release from prison for using fake travel documents to escape legal consequences related to the crypto crash.

‚ÄúFor all of crypto‚Äôs promises, the lack of registration and compliance have very real consequences for real people,‚Äù said the SEC‚Äôs Director of Enforcement, Gurbir S. Grewal. ‚ÄúAs the hard work of our team shows, we will continue to use the tools at our disposal to protect the investing public, but it is high time for the crypto markets to come into compliance.‚Äù
The United States and Kwon‚Äôs native South Korea are currently vying for his extradition amidst a lengthy legal battle for the Terraform Labs founder.
According to experts, Kwon‚Äôs legal team is pushing for him to be sent back to his home country in hopes of receiving a lighter sentence.
SEC In Hot Water With Crypto Community
Meanwhile, the SEC is facing its own challenges in regulating digital assets, with many in the crypto community displeased with the federal agency‚Äôs regulation-by-enforcement approach.
Earlier this month, SEC officials Michael Welsh and Joseph Watkins resigned after facing harsh criticism and legal repercussions over their handling of the DEBT Box case.
Similarly, SEC Commissioner Hester Pierce has publicly criticized her agency, claiming the commission‚Äôs regulatory tactics were ‚Äúscaring people off.‚Äù
It‚Äôs unclear when and how Kwon will respond to the SEC‚Äôs billion-dollar demands.

title: Cardano Foundation Launches PRAGMA: A New Chapter in Open-Source Blockchain Development
author: Thomas Musgrave

elements: Cardano Foundation Launches PRAGMA: A New Chapter in Open-Source Blockchain Development
The Cardano Foundation unveiled PRAGMA on April 22, a strategic initiative designed to propel open-source development within the Cardano blockchain ecosystem and beyond.
PRAGMA is a nonprofit organization that‚Äôs currently partnered with dcSpark, Blink Labs, TxPipe, and Sundae Labs to establish a strong blockchain ecosystem for Carnado and other blockchains.
Cardano PRAGMA‚Äôs Vision and Launch
PRAGMA already commenced its operations in Zug, Switzerland. This marks an important milestone for the company as it enters a new market and expands its global footprint.

The program actively supports a diverse range of open-source projects within the PRAGMA initiative, encompassing both established and nascent projects. This includes promoting the ongoing development of tools like Aiken, a platform dedicated to smart contract advancement, and Amaru, a full node built in Rust.

Such projects are pivotal in achieving PRAGMA‚Äôs goal of fostering a streamlined and efficient development environment for the open-source blockchain community.

‚ÄúAt the Cardano Foundation, we are advocates for the open-source maturity of the Cardano ecosystem, supporting collaborative initiatives that increase the diversity, as well as the quality and quantity of blockchain solutions,‚Äù Cardano Foundation CEO Frederik Gregaard stated.
Open‚ÄìSource Collaboration for Blockchain Advancement

With the Cardano PRAGMA initiative at its core, the Cardano ecosystem has set goals to expand its developer community by 2025. This strategic expansion can broaden Cardano‚Äòs reach within the open‚Äìsource blockchain community, offering developers more opportunities to contribute to the ecosystem‚Äòs growth.
